JOB DECSRIPTION: ['Who We Are\xa0', "Founded in 2010, BEworks is an unconventional management consulting firm that applies scientific thinking to transform the economy and society. Our team of experts in cognitive and social psychology, neuroscience, and marketing answer our clients' most complex business questions, execute disruptive growth strategies, and accelerate innovation. Part of the kyu collective of companies since January 2017, the firm's client list includes Fortune 500 companies, not-for-profit organizations, and government agencies. BEworks was co-founded by Dan Ariely, renowned behavioral scientist, Kelly Peters, the firm's CEO and BE pioneer, and top marketing scholar Nina Mažar.", 'Job Description', 'We are looking for students that are either working towards or completed their Masters or\xa0PhD in psychology (social, cognitive, or consumer), judgment and decision making, neuroscience, and/or marketing (with a focus on consumer behavior).\xa0This rigorous internship will provide you with an opportunity to apply the knowledge, skills, methods, and techniques that you’ve learned during your academic careers to real-world challenges. You will be working on both internal and client projects supporting on some of today’s most pressing business and policy challenges, such as shifting energy consumption behavior, helping financial planners measure customer risk in a more valid and reliable manner, designing insurance products, developing new scales for measuring trust, etc.', 'The internship period is a 16-week engagement from May\xa0until August 2020.', 'Responsibilities', 'We take a scientific approach to everything that we do – and you will be supporting in this goal. A typical day could look like:', 'Analysis', ': using statistical analysis to identify trends, patterns, and relationships in the data and make them relevant to the decision makers', 'Cleaning data:', '\xa0determining what data to include and exclude in analyses (outliers). Knowledge of when and how to transform skewed data for parametric analyses, if necessary.', 'Controls', ': assessing the appropriateness of the controls and modifying controls, if necessary (e.g., re-weighting or resampling data)', 'Testing', ':\xa0parametric (e.g., t-test, factor analyses, mixed effects modeling) and non-parametric (e.g. chi-square) testing. Familiarity with post-hoc analyses and interpreting findings.', 'Predictive models:', '\xa0', 'creating linear and logistic regression models and methods to improve models (e.g., stepwise regression, principles component analyses etc.)', 'Effect Size', ':\xa0calculating and interpreting effect size', 'Project-Based Work:', 'Experiment and survey design for client projects, white papers, and research initiatives', 'Data visualization', 'Creating client presentations and writing white papers based on insights generated', 'Qualifications', 'We need someone who:', 'Is working towards or has completed their Masters or\xa0PhD in any applied quantitative discipline (preference for candidates with knowledge in psychology (preferably social, cognitive, or consumer), neuroscience, marketing (consumer behavior focus), judgment and decision making, or economics', 'Can differentiate a good study design from a bad one', 'Can list the top 5 scientific\xa0judgment\xa0and decision-making journals based on impact factor', 'Has a running list of experiments they want/wish they could run', 'Has strong research methods knowledge for randomized control trial design', 'Can identify relationships in data and to provide relevant insights to decision makers', 'Has a high proficiency with R programming (proficiency in other languages i.e. Python, SPSS, etc. are beneficial but not strictly required)', 'Can create data visualizations and meaningfully interpret analyses to a business audience', 'Has a demonstrated ability to interpret data from both RCT and quasi-experimental trials', 'Is high energy, self-starter who possesses a strong commitment to excellence', 'Desires to work in a highly collaborative (and frankly, sometimes noisy) team', 'Goes the extra mile', 'Is deadline driven, organized, and able to multitask', 'Has strong verbal, written, and presentation skills\xa0', 'We welcome and encourage\xa0you to apply even if you do not think you might meet all the specified qualifications above. Though we thank you in advance for submitting your application, only qualified, selected candidates will be contacted.', 'You must be legally eligible to work in Canada to apply.', "BEworks is committed to building a diverse workforce representative of the communities we serve. We are proud to be in compliance with the Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act (AODA), 2005 and the Integrated Accessibility Standards Regulation. Accommodation will be provided in all parts of the recruitment and assessment (if applicable) process as required under BEworks' policies and procedures. Applicants must make their accommodation needs known when first contacted by the recruitment team."]

['ABOUT US', ' ', '  ', 'Peloton Search Partners is a Toronto based specialized recruitment firm with a focus on placing investment professionals in private equity, pension funds, venture capital, family offices, infrastructure, real estate, and in corporate development. As a result of our 20 years of recruitment experience, we have a broad global and domestic reach and proven reputation for building high caliber and cohesive teams for our clients. ', ' ', 'Venture Capital Analyst - Toronto ', '  ', ' ', 'Overview:\xa0', '\xa0 ', '  ', 'As an Analyst, you don’t need to have any VC experience coming into the role. Here are some of the other qualities this position requires as we build our team: ', '  ', '● \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 ', 'Strong interpersonal skills and networks. ', 'Ultimately, we are serving Founders and\u200b start-up teams. ', '  ', '● \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 ', 'Discipline. ', 'We are honest about ourselves - we operate with a discipline that sometimes\u200b\xa0 borders on obsession. We track everything. We are list people. ', '  ', '● \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 ', 'Be a part of perfecting the craft ', '—encourages all team members to create and\u200b \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0  execute on their own projects to add insight, efficiency and scale our internal processes to help support our growth, and have a long-lasting impact on the team, and our community of founders and investors. ', '  ', '● \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 ', 'Proven ability to work with others in a collaborative environment. ', '  ', '● \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 ', 'Finally we care', '. And we find time in our busy schedules to make a real difference in our\u200b   communities, supporting gender and racial issues, environmental and social causes, etc. ', '  ', '\xa0 ', '  ', 'So, with this in mind, building a diverse team is one of our client’s core values. ['Company Description', 'We are Valtech, a digital agency with an unprecedented ambition to set the tone of the future digital business. Are you ready to play along? ', 'Valtech is a digital consulting and delivery group building solutions for the economy of experience with 3000+ employees across 41 offices worldwide. In North America, we have offices in New York, Dallas, Chicago, San Diego, Toronto and Montreal. We’re looking ahead. We are driven by a visionary mindset, and that means there is plenty of room for initiative and for talented people to shape who we are tomorrow. Valtech helps clients orchestrate experiences, integrate them into your existing ecosystem and then evolve them, adapting to rapidly changing digital landscapes. Making it intuitive for users to consume products and services in whatever way they want. We are a new breed of digital agency uniquely designed to help business leaders succeed in this new digital economy.', 'Job Description', 'The Job', 'Valtech is seeking a data-minded Marketing Analyst with experience in measurement, testing, analytics, dashboards and optimization within digital channels, with a passion for helping clients boost the performance and ROI of investments in these channels via SEO, A|B testing, personalization and more.', 'This is an exciting opportunity to grow your skills and work with a fantastic roster of clients within a growing Marketing Science practice at Valtech. We place a strong emphasis on KPIs, measurement and tagging across the customer journey, and we take an experiment-driven approach; we help our clients get the highest ROI from their marketing technology ecosystem. You’ll be hands on with variety of platforms including Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Sitecore, Optimizely and others (feel free to bring your favorite tools into the mix).', 'Your day will have immense variety; you’ll be running client workshops, designing tagging strategies, mining Google Analytics for opportunities and reporting on campaign performance. There will be plenty of opportunity to apply your math and analyst skills to link tactics and experiments to revenue and conversion lift, in a variety of client and vertical contexts. If you’re interested in data science or machine learning, we’re working on applying those techniques to marketing data as well!', 'Most importantly, you love to tell data-driven stories of measureable improvements to digital performance.', 'What You’ll Do', 'You will be working closely with colleagues across our division and the role breaks down into two large buckets:', 'Billable client work including:', 'Delivery of workshops to define KPIs, digital objectives, project requirements, education on digital best practices', 'Delivery and implementation of optimization roadmaps and experiments', 'Delivery and implementation of data strategy, data layer design and tagging plans', 'Research into latest practices, tools, approaches to make informed recommendations', 'Providing general guidance and expertise to our clients as a trusted advisor', 'Non-billable work to produce thought leadership and provide sales support defining early opportunities ', 'Travel within Canada and US is expected for to deliver client workshops.', 'Qualifications', 'The Ideal Candidate', 'Understanding of the digital marketing space, including popular tools and common channel strategies spanning web, email, social and mobile', 'Experience in configuring and using Google Analytics to understand visitor behavior and identify opportunities for optimization', 'Understanding of audience segmentation and content targeting to segments', 'Experience presenting to stakeholders and delivering workshops and training engagements', 'Experience developing and prioritizing KPIs to measure a program, initiative or project', 'Understanding of marketing strategy and optimization tactics including personalization, SEO, A|B testing, automation', 'Experience embedding analytics and optimization within larger digital delivery projects', 'Nice to have: Experience in a consulting or client services environment', 'Nice to have: Experience with tools such as Sitecore, Adwords, Semrush, CrazyEgg, Google Data Studio', 'Additional Information', 'Here’s what it’s like to work for us: ', 'We’re advisors, visionaries, creative and techies', '…with an agency mindset. We believe in working together, and that the best results come when we pool our knowledge and brainstorm the right solution for our customers.', 'We embrace all things digital.', 'Our ambition is to become a global leader in the digital space. No more, no less. Our customers look to us to help them succeed in the digital landscape. We deliver work that makes them the leaders in their industries, based on a thorough understanding of their business and a close collaboration with their employees.', 'We Talk To Each Other.', 'We work in an open environment, with business developers, web technologists, strategists and creatives sitting side-by-side, pooling their collective wisdom in order to come up with the best solution for our clients.', 'We have fun.', 'We don’t believe in boredom. We do work hard, and we put in the hours we need to get the job done, but we also have a vibrant, dynamic atmosphere with passionate colleagues who enjoy what they do.', 'We love our clients.', 'Seriously! They are the reason why we are here. And why wouldn’t we? We are working with some of the biggest and most interesting brands in the world, along with a lot of other companies that all have great ambition to succeed in the digital space.', 'We’re looking ahead.', 'We are driven by a visionary mindset, and that means there is plenty of room for initiative and for talented people to shape who we are tomorrow.', 'Up for the challenge?', 'Then we will be more than happy to hear from you. We have on-going interviews so send your application as soon as possible via the apply button.', 'We welcome and encourage applications from people with disabilities. Accommodations are available on request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process.', 'We thank all applicants. However, only those selected for an interview will be contacted.', '*** We do not accept unsolicited candidate profiles from recruiting firms***']

['What We Are Building', 'At Rubikloud, we are on a mission to bring “Intelligent Decision Automation” to the world’s largest enterprise retailers. Our platform unifies the latest in distributed systems, artificial intelligence, cloud architecture and some of the brightest minds to fulfill our mission. Over the past three years, we have been able to connect with over 150,000 retail point of sales location in 10 countries and create a database of over $100 billion in first party retail transactional data. And the numbers are only growing!', 'Requirements', 'Who We Are Looking For ', 'All aspects of building data science products are familiar to you wrangling with messy or missing data, feature engineering, prototyping statistical/machine learning models, and coding up an appropriate solution that’s fit for production. You are driven by the thought of solving real-world business problems and a practical mindset using the more appropriate technique for the problem, whether that be a simple linear regression or a LSTM.', 'You’re a quick learner able to adapt to a myriad of challenges that come up in a data science project whether that be digging into a dataset to perform feature engineering, zooming into details of Scikit-learn algorithm implementation, or designing an experiment to test the efficacy of a new collaborative filtering algorithm. You’re fluent in Python, have run more SQL queries than you would like to admit, and have hands-on experience with big data technologies such as Spark and Hadoop. You get the Frequentist vs. Bayesian jokes on xkcd (and love explaining it), can comfortably explain the difference between a random forest and gradient boosted trees, and are always willing to get your hands dirty analyzing the minutiae in the data.', 'As an effective communicator, you’ll collaborate with other like minded individuals to come up with creative solutions to our retail data science problems interfacing across all departments and teams. Your primary focus is on providing meaningful impact to our clients, which requires asking the right questions, distilling the problem and coming up with creative solutions.', 'Who You Are', 'Requirements', ' ', 'Masters/PhD degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics or related field', ' ', 'Proficiency with various machine learning & statistical techniques', ' ', 'Proficiency in Python or other data manipulation or analysis languages; software development experience is a plus', ' ', 'Experience working with relational data via SQL; experience with big data technologies such as Spark and Hadoop a plus', ' ', 'Ability to work in *nix environments', ' ', 'Benefits', 'Who We Are ', 'We are a group of intellectually curious people who are passionate about making a big splash in the world of retail. We offer competitive compensation including equity options - we want all the members of Rubikrew to own part of the Company. You will have a full health benefits package including extended health care, dental, vision etc. Lunch is catered Monday to Thursday so you won’t have to worry about packing a lunch! Healthy snacks and drinks are also provided to keep you energized. We want our employees to feel like they’re always developing personally and professionally so we offer a a personal development budget that you are free to use for knowledge expansion or as a fitness allowance.', 'Thank you to all who apply. We are only contacting applicants who are moving on to the next stage of the process. If you don’t hear from us, please check back for any future opportunities!', 'Rubikloud welcomes and encourages applications from people with disabilities. Accommodations are available upon request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process.']

['Auth0 is a pre-IPO unicorn. We are growing rapidly and looking for exceptional new team members to add to our teams and will help take us to the next level. One team, one score.', 'We never compromise on identity. You should never compromise yours either. We want you to bring your whole self to Auth0. If you’re passionate, practice radical transparency to build trust and respect, and thrive when you’re collaborating, experimenting and learning – this may be your ideal work environment. We are looking for team members that want to help us build upon what we have accomplished so far and make it better every day. N+1 > N.', 'The Data Scientist will help build, scale and maintain the entire data science platform. The ideal candidate will have a deep technical understanding, hands-on experience in building Machine Learning models coming up with valuable insights, and promoting a data-driven culture across the organization. They would not hesitate to wrangle data, if necessary, understand the business objectives and have a good understanding of the entire data stack.', 'This position plays a key role in data initiatives, analytics projects, and influencing key stakeholders with critical business insights. You should be passionate for continuous learning, experimenting, applying and contributing towards cutting edge open source Data Science technologies.', 'Responsibilities', 'Use Python and the vast array of AI/ML libraries to analyze data and build statistical models to solve specific business problems.', 'Improve upon existing methodologies by developing new data sources, testing model enhancements, and fine-tuning model parameters.', 'Collaborate with researchers, software developers, and business leaders to define product requirements and provide analytical support.', 'Directly contribute to the design and development of automated selection systems.', 'Build customer-facing reporting tools to provide insights and metrics which track system performance.', 'Communicate verbally and in writing to business customers and leadership team with various levels of technical knowledge, educating them about our systems, as well as sharing insights and recommendations', 'Basic Qualifications', "Bachelor's degree in Statistics, Applied Math, Operations Research, Engineering, Computer Science, or a related quantitative field2 years of working experience as a Data ScientistProficient with data analysis and modeling software such as Spark, R, Python etc.", 'Proficient with using scripting language such as Python and data manipulation/analysis libraries such as Scikit-learn and Pandas for analyzing and modeling data.', 'Experienced in using multiple data science methodologies to solve complex business problems.', 'Experienced in handling large data sets using SQL and databases in a business environment.', 'Excellent verbal and written communication.', 'Strong troubleshooting and problem solving skills.', 'Thrive in a fast-paced, innovative environment.', 'Preferred Qualifications', "Master's degree in Statistics, Applied Math, Operations Research, Engineering, Computer Science, or a related quantitative field.", '2+ years’ experience as a Data Scientist.', 'Fluency in a scripting or computing language (e.g. Python, Scala, C++, Java, etc.)', 'Superior verbal and written communication skills with the ability to effectively advocate technical solutions to scientists, engineering teams and business audiences.', 'Experienced in writing academic-styled papers for presenting both the methodologies used and results for data science projects.', 'Demonstrable track record of dealing well with ambiguity, ability to self-motivate, prioritizing needs, and delivering results in a dynamic environment.', 'Combination of deep technical skills and business savvy to interface with all levels and disciplines within our and our customer’s organizations', 'Skills And Abilities', '+ BA/BS in Computer Science, related technical field or equivalent practical experience.', 'At least 3 years of relevant work experienceAbility to write, analyze, and debug SQL queries.', 'Exceptional Problem solving and analytical skills.', 'Fluent in implementing logistic regression, random forest, XGBoost, bayesian and ARIMA in Python/RExperience in User path navigation with Markov Chain, STAN Bayesian analysis for A/B testingFamiliarity with Sentiment Analysis (NLP) and LSTM AI modelsExperience in full AI/ML life-cycle from model development, training, deployment, testing, refining and iterating.', 'Experience in Tableau, Apache SuperSet, Looker or similar BI tools.', 'Knowledge of AWS Redshift, Snowflake or similar databases', 'Preferred Locations:', '#US; #AR;', 'Auth0’s mission is to help developers innovate faster. Every company is becoming a software company and developers are at the center of this shift. They need better tools and building blocks so they can stay focused on innovating. One of these building blocks is identity: authentication and authorization. That’s what we do. Our platform handles 2.5B logins per month for thousands of customers around the world. From indie makers to Fortune 500 companies, we can handle any use case.', 'We like to think that we are helping make the internet safer. We have raised $210M to date and are growing quickly. Our team is spread across more than 35 countries and we are proud to continually be recognized as a great place to work. Culture is critical to us, and we are transparent about our vision and principles .', 'Join us on this journey to make developers more productive while making the internet safer!']

['Zensurance is looking to hire an experienced Data Analyst to help us make better sense of our data. You’ll be working with the Sales and Product teams to help us pinpoint and address inefficiencies in our business. You’ll also work with Engineering to ensure the integrity of our data, and to help automate the repetitive parts of your job so that you can spend your time doing what’s important: solving business problems!', ' Responsibilities ', 'Architect efficient and scalable solutions to answer questions about our business.', 'Distill large datasets from our data warehouse into useable dashboard for stakeholders.', 'Write clean and efficient SQL to transform raw data into models.', 'Help with the implementation and adoption of business intelligence solutions.', 'Nice to have', 'Experience using dbt to layer views/models', 'Experience with git', 'Comfortable on the command line', 'Some programming experience', 'Experience working in an Agile environment', 'Experience surfacing business insights, including defining and measure KPIs', 'Required Qualifications', '4+ years in a similar role', 'Advanced SQL knowledge', 'Experience with data warehouses and large data sets', 'Proficient in Excel', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills', 'Experience creating data visualizations', 'Comfortable with ambiguity', 'Degree in Commerce, Business, or Computer Science, or equivalent experience', ' Perks We Offer At Zensurance ', ' Opportunity to work for Canada’s fastest growing insurtech start up', ' Contemporary office downtown TO, 1 minute from Osgoode Station and 7 minutes from Union Station', ' Flexible work environment / work from home arrangements available to everyone', ' Modern technology - laptops provided to all staff', ' Comprehensive, flexible health and dental plans to suit all lifestyles', ' Weekly Friday company-wide meetings in our comfortable #zenden with beverages and great snacks', ' Build next level relationships with your peers through scheduled companywide team building events', ' Be a part of something special, we are confident you won’t find any other insurance company like us :)', " Who We Are. What We're Building. ", 'Business is hard work, insurance doesn’t have to be!', 'At Zensurance we believe that teamwork makes the dream work.', 'We are passionate about providing business owners with the best insurance solutions at great rates through an online and easy to use platform.', ' Here At Zensurance Our Culture Is Built On Three Core Values That We Live And Breathe Everyday, They Are ', 'Our secret sauce is all about our culture.', 'INSPIRE: We put people first and empower them to be the best they can be.', 'INVENT: We take an innovative approach to creating straightforward solutions for our customers.', 'DELIVER: We set ambitious goals and hold ourselves accountable to achieving them.', 'If reading all that piqued your interest, drop us a line and let us know why you would be a great fit for us. Whether it be through a resume - or something else you think is better - send us what you believe will impress us. Show us your creative process - how you think and solve problems!', 'True to its Canadian values, Zensurance celebrates diversity in its workforce structure and encourages applications from all backgrounds.']

['What is the Opportunity?', 'We have multiple opportunities open for Data Scientists based on level of experience and specialization sub-domains.', 'As a Data Scientist specialized in a subdomain, you will analyze, design and implement data science solutions using RBC’s enterprise suite of analytics tools. Ideal Candidates will have 2+ years of hands-on experience ', 'Experience with machine learning and statistical techniques (e.g. naive bayes, decision trees, kmeans, SVMs) and testing/validation, visualizing data, test results and assess model performance', 'Experience with common machine learning and deep learning libraries (e.g., scikit-learn, Weka, Tensorflow, PyTorch etc. & writing and testing functional and error free code in at least 1 compiled language, and at least 1 other programming language (Python, Scala, etc.)', 'Familiarity with collaborative software development tools (git, issue tracking) and *nix environments', 'Ability to perform complex data analysis and present findings to stakeholders', 'Strong interpersonal and communication skills (both written and verbal) productions as Rest APIs, batch jobs or dashboards.', 'Experience implementing Service Oriented Architectures.', 'Passion for writing high-quality, maintainable and robust code.', 'Experience in various deep learning architectures specific to domains (CNNs, RNNs, Transformers, AutoEncoders)', 'Experience with data visualization libraries (e.g. TensorBoard, Matplotlib)', 'What’s in it for comprehensive Total Rewards Program including bonuses and flexible benefits, competitive compensation, commissions, and stock where applicable', 'Leaders who support your development through coaching and managing opportunities', 'Ability to make a difference and lasting impact', 'Work in a dynamic, collaborative, progressive, and high-performing team', 'A world-class training program in financial ['Help us boldly shape retail in Canada ', 'Canadian Tire Corporation’s (CTC) rich heritage of serving Canadians from coast-to-coast dates back to 1922. Our vision is to become the #1 retail brand in Canada by 2022 and we are focused on innovating and making important investments in our business, especially when it comes to our people. To reach our goal, we need the best talent to help us evolve and drive change across the business – and boldly help shape Canada’s retail industry. As we strive to be at the forefront of a complex and vastly changing retail industry, it is an exciting time to join the Canadian Tire family of companies.', 'The Customer Insights and Analytics Group at Canadian Tire delivers customer-focused analytical solutions and insights that enable lasting and meaningful customer relationships. We are a diverse and dynamic team of analysts, data scientists, developers, and consumer researchers united by a common goal – placing the customer at the center of every business decision. We utilize the latest data technologies and advanced analytical techniques to demystify shopper behaviour and embed those insights deep within the fabric of the business. Genuinely passionate about the transformative power of customer data and our role as the “voice” of our customers, we relentlessly push the boundaries of data analytics to ensure we understand our customers better than anyone else and deliver the experiences that will earn their continued loyalty. Our work is redefining the Canadian Tire shopping experience and is a key pillar in our mission to become the most innovative retailer in the world.', 'Reporting to the Manager, Customer Insights, you will be a key contributor to the development and execution of customer intelligence across the Canadian Tire Retail business. You will work closely with counterparts across Merchandising, Marketing, Digital, E-Commerce, Store Support and other business divisions with an overall mandate to optimize customer outcomes and drive business growth through a deep understanding of customer behaviour. You will support business initiatives by analyzing customer behaviour across a wide range of data sources and provide insightful solutions to a variety of internal clients. This position is an excellent opportunity for you to strengthen and further develop your analytical skillset and business acumen in a hands-on, collaborative environment.', 'What You’ll Do', ' Develop robust, scalable SQL queries and Pyspark code to synthesize information across a variety of data sources ', ' Work closely with your manager, Loyalty Operation team and IT teams to understand business processes, challenges, needs and objectives, and to execute your clients’ customer analytics enablement plans ', ' Work closely with counterparts in other specialist teams (Data Science, Consultants, Consumer Research) in order to addresses client needs through a customer lens ', ' Design all pipelines with a goal to standardize, generalize and automate with proper documentation ', ' Learn and become the data champion of the organization’s customer data by identifying opportunities and approaches to improve data integrity ', 'Who You Are', 'We are looking for individuals who are:', ' Detailed oriented with a problem-solving mind set and impeccable attention to detail ', ' Creative and courageous, with the ability to manage in an environment of change and ambiguity to help us take bold, strategic moves in this rapidly evolving retail environment ', ' Action oriented, and comfortable taking calculated risks to better serve our customers and business ', ' Outcome focused, critical thinkers with the ability to analyze and visualize, to ensure continuous improvement across our entire business ', ' Collaborative team players with superior influencing skills, who build relationships easily across various stakeholder groups to move initiatives forward ', 'If you’re curious, ready to take on new challenges and open to doing things differently to help us evolve rapidly, then this is definitely the place to be.', 'What You Bring', ' Undergraduate degree in CS, Math, Information Technology or Engineering ', ' 1 year of relevant work experience with a preferred focus on retail/loyalty analytics ', ' Strong proficiency with SQL and its variation among popular databases such as Hive, Netezza and BigQuery ', ' Working knowledge of Python and various Python libraries ', ' Experience with other analytical platforms and tools (e.g. Hadoop, PySpark, Azure, GCP, BigQuery, Data Studio, Airflow, Snowflake etc.) considered an asset ', ' Competency in data analysis and interpretation of results ', ' Ability to prioritize tasks with some guidance ', 'About Canadian Tire Corporation', 'Canadian Tire and its family of companies are boldly shaping retail in Canada and we continue to deliver a positive experience for our customers. As one of the most trusted brands in Canada, our employees take pride in the work we do across the country. It’s more than the iconic triangle that keeps our employees around. From benefits and perks, to learning and development opportunities, to our commitment to Jumpstart – these are some of the many reasons why Canadian Tire Corporation is one of Canada’s Top Employers .', 'To learn more about this team and the Canadian Tire family of companies follow us on LinkedIn .', 'Canadian Tire is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace for all. We recognize that our future success depends on the perspectives and contributions of all our employees -- their diverse backgrounds, abilities and experiences make our business stronger. If you are contacted for a job opportunity, please advise us of any accommodations needed to ensure fair and equitable access throughout the recruitment and selection process. All accommodation information provided will be treated as confidential and used only for the purpose of providing an accessible candidate experience.', 'Ontario-Toronto', 'Permanent', 'Full-time', 'Job Posting', 'Mar 5, 2020, 2:03:44 PM']

['Program Laboratory Operations', 'Job ID 2464', 'Organizational Overview', 'Great people, exceptional teams building a stronger Public Health Ontario.', 'We are Public Health Ontario (PHO). We live our values as a shared promise to each other, our clients and our partners. We value credibility, innovation, responsiveness, collaboration, integrity and respect.', 'With our partners in Ontario’s health system, we monitor and address the needs of the population by providing the scientific evidence and expert guidance that shapes policies and practices for a healthier Ontario. With locations across Ontario, we are working to ensure that Ontario has the strongest public health system in the world so that every day Ontarians wake up in one of the safest places to live in the world.', 'For more information about PHO, visit www.publichealthontario.ca', 'Position Details Position Title: Data Scientist', 'Department: PHO Laboratory, Laboratory Sciences', 'Duration: Permanent Full-time', 'Location: 661 University Ave', 'Status: Open', 'Compensation Group: Non-Union', 'Posting Date: March 6, 2020', 'Closing Date: March 20, 2020', 'Purpose of Position', 'To provide scientific oversight and strategic leadership for the applied data program at Public Health Ontario with a focus on laboratory data, and to set the standards and provide leadership for the development and application of data science in clinical public health microbiology programs and applied public health research in order to inform high quality and effective laboratory testing, clinical and public health services.', 'Key Responsibilities', ' Provides scientific oversight, expert advice and support for the translation and implementation of highly specialized, complex and integrated data program for the surveillance of infectious diseases using laboratory data, detection and real time analysis of outbreaks of public health importance, and the evaluation and support of delivery of public health microbiological laboratory testing services to ensure optimal clinical and public health value in Ontario.', ' Forms partnerships and integrates routine PHO laboratory data with other important data set to provide evidence and tools to support and inform responsible and high quality microbiological diagnostics, surveillance and response capacity, and public health programs around infectious diseases. Data sets to be included are genomic and enhanced epidemiological data available at the PHO laboratory, the Ontario Laboratory Information System Data (OLIS), Integrated Public Health Information System (iPHIS), the administrative health care data hosted by the Institute of Clinical and Evaluative Sciences (ICES), research data sets, and other data as available and required.', ' Acts a core member of the data science team at PHO, and collaborates with relevant programmatic departments across the organization. ', ' Increases and improves the quality and timeliness of data to support disease diagnosis, prevention and treatment of infectious diseases of public health relevance with a focus on the use and integration of laboratory data through working with PHO laboratory data. ', ' Advances laboratory testing data and data tool development for improved test and value for the province.', ' Adapts and integrates visualization tools to ensure that de-identified data is used to guide and evaluate test performance and surveillance tools.', ' Furthers the use of machine learning applied to laboratory data to increase the value, timeliness and quality for Ontario of laboratory testing and Co-leads a robust privacy model and approach for accomplishing the integrated laboratory data sets necessary for effective and high value clinical and public health delivery', ' Recommends improvements in data analytic methods, equipment and new testing technology, and introduces advanced approaches & protocols for data analysis for diagnostic and public health laboratory response when required.', ' Provides technical guidance and professional expertise in proposing laboratory guidelines, procedures and evaluation criteria that apply to data science and surveillance solutions.', ' Assess existing and proposed laboratory procedures, standards, policies and plans as it relates to data science capacity and deliverables. ', ' Acts as a PHO Laboratory resident expert on data science. Prepares detailed, well-focused technical reports, laboratory manuals and scientific papers for approval by management and/or scientific staff.', ' Develops & provides oversight for educational capacity and programs for Laboratory data science at Public Health Ontario in collaboration with the Director of Laboratory Information and Research Operations, the Director of Informatics, and data science and surveillance personnel lending expertise where needed in building strategy and delivery of high quality informatics tools, research and education.', ' Works closely with Information Technology to align business needs with planning, prioritization and delivery of the data science program.', ' Provides consultation and specialized advisory services to PHO’s officials, regional staff, physicians, other health care providers, physicians, hospital and private laboratories, medical and clinical microbiologists, Medical Officers of Health, health units and regional laboratories, on the application of data science methodologies to laboratory data. Identifies matters of potential public health importance e.g. unusual or emerging trends and informs the supervisor. Responds to sudden events and circumstances.', ' Facilitates and collaborates on research projects with provincial, national, and international organizations, universities, and other academic centres.', ' Represents PHO laboratories at internal and external meetings, on task forces and advisory committees, and build linkages with University and College academic health science centres.', ' Supports the Chief, Medical Microbiology, and the Chief Laboratory Operations Officer in the management of emergency and exigent situations. Identify matters of potential public health importance e.g. unusual or emerging pathogens and informs the Chief of Microbiology and or other members of the senior leadership team as appropriate. Respond to sudden events and circumstances.', ' Demonstrates and support the core values of PHO thereby ensuring that the goals, objectives and strategic priorities of PHO are met.', 'Knowledge and Skills', ' Experience, proficiency and knowledge in diverse programming languages, packages and tools including but not limited to R, Python, Javascript, Git, SAS, SPSS, SQL, Power BI.', ' Knowledge and experience integrating and analyzing large datasets including microbial testing data, or other big data initiatives. ', ' Knowledge of and experience with laboratory testing and microbiology, including public health genomics is an asset.', ' Knowledge and proficiency in the application of privacy legislation.', ' Demonstrated experience working in a public health laboratory, academic laboratory, or public health organization with a focus on the use and interpretation of laboratory tests or equivalent collaborative research environment is an asset.', 'Education and Experience', ' Position requires a PhD degree from a recognized educational institution.', ' Must have experience in health informatics, data science, biostatistics, applied mathematics, computer science, engineering, epidemiology, or machine learning or equivalent discipline.', 'Attributes and Competencies', ' Contributes to quality outcomes where applicable, ensuring the portfolio meets accreditation standards including TQM as set out by Institute of Quality Management in Healthcare (IQMH) and Canadian Association for Laboratory Accreditation (CALA).', ' Communication, consultation, and presentation skills to consult with a broad range of professionals and government officials, teach at the post-secondary level, and make presentations to professional and lay groups.', ' Works with Clinical/ Medical Microbiologists and scientists, and operational team to develop overall strategies to advance laboratory based Data science for public health delivery.', 'Job Status Full Time Regular', 'Posting date 3/6/2020', 'Closing date 3/20/2020', 'Street Address 661 University Avenue', 'City Toronto', 'Province Ontario [ON]', 'Country Canada [CA]']

['BE authentic . BE influential . BE the expert . Be all that and more at Colliers International. ', 'At Colliers International, we help leaders succeed by helping them build amazing workplaces, businesses and communities around the world. We do this by thinking differently, sharing innovative ideas and offering a unique and collaborative workplace where you can succeed.', 'Join our team as Research Analyst in our Toronto West office (Etobicoke), ON.', 'Who You Are', 'You’re a research professional with a clear understanding of the real estate industry who’s looking to translate your creative and innovative ideas in a growing industry. Through the provision of cutting edge, high-quality research and analysis, the Research Analyst will drive the competitive advantage of Colliers’ uncommon knowledge. You’re confident reporting on market activity and providing insights through whitepapers and specialized, tailored research.', 'You’re highly organized and have a keen eye for detail, ensuring a high standard of quality in everything you do. You’re flexible and thrive in a fast-paced, team environment where no two days are the same. You demonstrate excellent interpersonal skills with brokers and clients. You also love to learn and exchange ideas with others to achieve amazing results.', 'What You Bring', 'Undergraduate degree required. Real Estate or Business post-secondary is an asset.', '2+ years of commercial Real Estate industry or other advisory services experience', 'Clear understanding of commercial Real Estate industry trends and strategy, including statistical analysis and research writing.', 'Advanced Microsoft Office skills including Excel.', 'Ability to confidently present data and market insights to a variety of clients.', 'Strong networking and relationship-building ability, proactive, results-oriented, and resourceful.', 'Attention to detail and an ability to meet tight deadlines without compromising quality.', 'Bonus skills and experience', 'Experience with data visualization and mapping tools (Power BI, Tableau, ArcGIS).', 'Experience in maintaining and enhancing large property data sets to the highest levels of accuracy.', 'What Success Looks Like', 'You’re a positive individual with a huge passion for observing, receiving, and otherwise obtaining information', 'You feel confident standing in front of an audience to present on research findings, and to tell the industrial market story.', 'You have a keen eye for detail, and you are enthusiastic in managing, recording, and analyzing market data for the production of periodic market research publications including quarterly reports and whitepapers.', 'You’re a team player, who proactively works with brokers and the Research team to undertake research and analytics.', 'You’re a positive representative of the Colliers brand, attending industry events in order to network and build relationships within the industry.', "You're committed to building a diverse and inclusive team where all employees can contribute and fulfill their potential in a positive environment.", 'BE who you are and what you want to be with Colliers International. ', 'We’d love to meet you. Apply today to join our team.', 'Direct applicants only please, no agencies.', "Colliers is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity in its workforce. Colliers encourages applications from all qualified individuals and will accommodate applicants' disability-related needs, up to the point of undue hardship, throughout all stages of the recruitment and selection process. If you require a disability-related accommodation in order to participate in the recruitment process, please contact the recruitment team by email at canada.careers@colliers.com."]

['Our Purpose ', 'We want to create a world served by exceptional professionals, and we do that by helping academic institutions find holistically stronger applicants. We help them look beyond book smarts. Think of us like an “SAT” that evaluates who you are instead of what you know. Our main assessment, the CASPer test, is used widely for high stakes admissions to Healthcare Training, Teachers Education and other academic programs in Canada, the US and as far away as Australia. In 2019, we have assessed well over 100,000 applicants including 80% of all US and Canadian Medical School applicants.', 'Who We Are', 'We are a group of ~50 individuals collaboratively working out of the OneEleven scale-up hub in the downtown core of Toronto. We tackle some tough problems (like how to evaluate empathy in someone who wants to become a doctor), and some less tough ones (like what to bring in for the communal snack table).', 'Our core values are caring, curious, and driven, and we embody these values in everything that we do. We genuinely care about the well-being of others, we possess an innate desire to continuously learn, and every day we strive to be better than the professional we were the day before.', 'Who Would Fit In', 'People who do well here are caring, humble, prefer change over the status-quo, are comfortable with “fuzzy” (vs. well defined) tasks, and are eager to solve problems. We all have a healthy appetite for learning and love to share our knowledge with our co-workers. We want people who put “we before me”.', 'The Role ', 'As a growing company, we strive to empower our team in making data-driven decisions by discovering valuable insights in the data we gather. Your primary focus will be in automating processes for teams to have immediate access to data, building data pipelines to create a powerful analytics database and working on various machine learning projects which strengthen the quality of our product. To date we have had over 300,000 people take the CASPer test and as a result have amassed a wealth of powerful data.', 'We are looking to add another Data Scientist to our team. You will be one of two Data Scientists working in the company reporting into the Director of Product.', 'In 12 Months ', ' ', 'You have immersed yourself in all things Altus, have learned our business, all the data we collect, its format, and have undertaken processing of structured and unstructured data.', ' ', 'You have created data pipelines from a NoSQL database to analyze results for various stakeholders and proposed solutions and strategies to business challenges.', ' ', 'You have created dashboards to help with business intelligence and analytics for other teams within the company having identified, analyzed, and interpreted trends or patterns in complex data sets using statistical techniques, and presented information using data visualization techniques to provide ongoing reports.', ' ', 'You have helped build predictive models and machine-learning algorithms and automated tasks within the company to help deliver results and evolve our processes', ' ', 'You have earned the respect of the Altus team for your endless curiosity and creative problem-solving when sharing data insights and results.', ' ', 'You are working with our Product team to prioritize business and information needs while locating and defining new process improvement opportunities for our Operations team', ' ', 'You are known for your problem solving skills and speed of execution and will always be looking for creative ways to accelerate our data processes and have earned the trust of your peers for your deep insights on how we might make improvements to our processes and support the growth and development of our company.', ' ', 'You are known as a leader on the data science team, executing on the vision, delivering results and sharing data insights that will help your teammates understand our business and customers better.', ' ', 'Having taken ownership, you are known as a significant “values fit” and "culture add" that is helping us build towards the type of “people first” high-performance company we want to be.', ' ', 'Requirements', 'What Will Help You in Your Role ', ' ', 'Bachelors in Mathematics, Physics, Computer Science, Information Management, or Statistics', ' ', 'Demonstrated technical expertise regarding data models, database design development, data mining, and segmentation techniques', ' ', 'Demonstrated strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy', ' ', 'Adept at queries, report writing, and presenting findings', ' ', 'Knowledge of R, Python, and AWS; familiarity with MongoDB or SQL is an asset', ' ', 'Understanding of machine-learning and operations research', ' ', 'Experience using business intelligence tools (e.g. Tableau)', ' ', 'Strong math skills (e.g. statistics, algebra); psychometrics skills are an asset', ' ', 'Problem-solving aptitude', ' ', 'What We Expect from a Mission, Values, & Culture Perspective ', ' ', 'Able to live our core values of Caring, Creative Problem Solving, Reliability, and Drive to help us attain our goal of creating a world full exceptional professionals', ' ', 'We need someone who is a self-starter, highly curious about how the business works, and be able to help us focus where it counts', ' ', 'Has loosely held, strong opinions - knows why they want what they want, but is also abundantly humble, can be wrong, and wants to seek out the best solution, no matter the source', ' ', 'Looking for a long-term relationship at a growing company', ' ', 'Interested in being part of an amazing, caring team, and wants to build a sustainable, high growth business', ' ', 'Benefits', 'The Perks ', ' ', 'Free snacks, drinks, and coffee in our office', ' ', 'Bi-weekly team lunches', ' ', '$3,000 annual personal and professional development budget', ' ', 'Generous self-directed vacation policy', ' ', 'Comprehensive health, dental and life insurance coverage', ' ', 'RRSP Matching Program', ' ', 'Extended Parental leave coverage', ' ', 'Team building and social events', ' ', 'Our Hiring Process ', 'Our hiring process optimizes for a positive candidate experience. The general hiring process looks like the following', ' ', 'Pre-screen. When you submit your application, it is sent directly to the hiring manager who will screen the application.', ' ', 'First phone call. If selected, our hiring manager will schedule a time for the first phone screen, which typically lasts about 30 minutes. The manager will ask you some general interview questions such as why you are interested in this role and then may ask for you to elaborate on some parts of your application.', ' ', 'On-site team interview. Once you pass the first phone screen, we will schedule an on-site team interview, where you will meet with 4-6 members of our team to assess your technical skills, values fit, and cultural add. You may also be asked to complete a short task that closely mirrors some aspects of the role. The in-person interview takes about 2-3 hours.', ' ', 'Final phone call. Once all the members have met and shared their thoughts, the hiring manager will consolidate this information and let you know of their decision. We may need to ask you a few more questions if there were any areas that needed a bit more expanding.', ' ', 'Altus is proud to be a diverse and equal opportunity employer and as such does not discriminate on the basis of race, colour, religion, sex, national origins, age, sexual orientation, disability or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws. Selection decisions are solely based on job-related factors. Special accommodations for candidates with disabilities can be made during the interview process if requested.']

['Ceridian. Makes Work Life Better™', 'This is our promise. Not only for our customers, but our employees as well.', 'Do you thrive in an innovative and exciting environment that’s continuously evolving? Ceridian is looking for fun, intelligent, team oriented people who believe in our values: Customer Focus, Transparency, Diligence, Optimism, and Agility. Our workplace culture provides empowering programs for career growth and offers diversity and inclusion groups to support every person’s career journey. Ceridian employees have declared Ceridian a Great Place to Work® in 2019, a Glassdoor Best Places to Work in 2019, and one of Canada’s Top 100 Employers for the 16th consecutive year!', 'Find out why Ceridian is such a great place to work.', 'Reporting to the VP of Business Data and Systems, t he ideal candidate will be intricately involved in running analytical experiments in a methodical manner and will regularly evaluate alternate models via theoretical approaches. You will apply data mining techniques, carry out statistical analysis and develop prediction systems to extract business insights and analyze trends to assist our customers. To fit into our culture you must be team-oriented, fun, friendly, honest, and respect others and their ideas.', 'Key Accountabilities', ' ', ' Partner with internal stakeholders from multiple departments to identify opportunity for applying data science to solve complex business challenges such as maximize yield, process robustness, predictable supply, proactive identification of potential issues. ', ' ', ' Extract, transform and analyze data from multiple data sources ensuring data quality and integrity is maintained from source to the final output. Develop and implement algorithms using advanced statistical and mathematical methods. ', ' ', ' Recommend and lead implementation of Process Analytical Technologies to enable data capture for use in quantitative analysis and improved level of process understanding. ', ' ', ' Provide clear and concise oral and written communication. ', ' ', ' Promote a strong quality mindset with a strong focus on data integrity, validation and data governance. ', ' ', 'Education And Experience', ' ', ' MS or PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Operations Research, Computational Biology or a similar technical field ', ' ', ' Minimum 3 years industry experience ', ' ', ' Strong experience in delivering insights through statistical data analysis, data modeling and data visualization ', ' ', ' Experience using tools such as R, SAS, SAS JMP, Python, Matlab, Statistica ', ' ', ' Experience with developing business requirements, use cases and user stories in a data analytics context ', ' ', ' Experience with data warehousing and business intelligence tools and platforms ', ' ', ' Exposure to best practices in data management and data governance practices ', ' ', ' Ability to deliver projects with complex requirements and a strong customer focus ', ' ', ' Ability to influence and communicate with a diverse group of stakeholders from multiple levels of management ', ' ', ' Ability to succeed in a team-oriented environment under very dynamic conditions ', ' ', ' Project Management and People Management experience ', ' ', ' Experience with Big Data ecosystem ', ' ', 'Ceridian combines the excitement of a startup environment, with the growth opportunities of a large organization. We believe our employees should be happy and healthy, with peace of mind and a sense of fulfillment. We provide our employees with comprehensive benefits for various life circumstances and needs, great opportunities for career development, and a balanced lifestyle to achieve personal and professional success.', 'Ceridian is fueled by the diversity of our talented employees. We are an equal opportunity employer and embrace all individuals and t hat makes them unique. We consider all applicants, regardless of age, religion, race, color, ancestry, gender, gender identity, disability, national origin, race, sexual orientation, military or veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local laws. We enthusiastically encourage all individuals to apply for positions that fit their passions. Come join our inclusive team and start collaborating with us on award winning projects!', ' We thank all applicants in advance for their interest in this position, however, only those selected for an interview will be contacted.']

['Flieber is a Silicon Valley-based technology startup that is the missing piece in the retail revolution. We have just raised our second round of capital with leading VCs and we are now accelerating our growth.', "We are looking for software engineers who are motivated to disrupt the way an entire industry operates. In this position, you will have the opportunity to quickly contribute mission-critical code and help shape fundamental aspects of the product. We have a collaborative culture of close teamwork across Engineering, Product, and Business. We seek a decentralized environment to create learning opportunities and challenges during our journey. Let's start Fliebing!", "We are looking to hire a highly creative Data Scientist to address data analytics challenges in our organization, to collect large volumes of data from varying sources, clean and interpret data, create solutions to overcome challenges and communicate with interested parties in order to disrupt the way an entire industry operates. We seek a decentralized environment to create learning opportunities and challenges during our journey. Let's start Fliebing!", 'Ideal Candidate', 'To succeed in this position; you need to be curious, creative and tech savvy. You need to stay up to date with data programming software and apps, have outstanding understanding of statistics and mathematics, and be proficient in writing algorithms. Top candidates will be persistent, and have excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.', 'Why Flieber', 'Early-stage startup with proven traction and high growth', 'Silicon Valley culture', 'Diverse team spread across different countries', 'Flexible work schedule', 'Aggressive stock options plan', 'Plenty of growth opportunities', 'Main Responsibilities', 'Having meetings with team members regarding projects', 'Collecting and interpreting data', 'Automating and integrating processes', 'Researching solutions to overcome data analytics challenges', 'Developing complex mathematical models that integrate business rules and requirements', 'Creating machine learning models', 'Communicating and meeting with engineers and other interested parties', 'Sharing complex ideas verbally and visually in an understandable manner with non-technical stakeholders', 'Build recommendation models for decision making features', 'Desired Qualifications', 'A BS, MSc, or PhD degree in Applied Mathematics, Statistics, or related fields', '4+ years industry experience', 'Advanced coursework in machine learning and programming', 'Experience using data visualization tools', 'Experience with data querying languages, and statistical or mathematical software', 'Proficient in writing algorithms, and knowing when to apply them', 'Excellent understanding of statistics, multi-variable calculus and linear algebra', 'Outstanding communication skills', ' About Flieber ', 'With the migration of retail from offline to online, the business dynamics is moving from high volumes and low efficiency to low volumes and high efficiency. As a result, the whole industry is having to adapt to this new reality, including all installed infrastructure, which was prepared for a world where physical stores, distribution centers and full containers were the norm.', "Flieber is enabling this change through the use of advanced technology and data analytics to reduce complexity in e-commerce operations. Our platform synchronizes sales velocity, supply-chain operations and inventory management, and our team executes on our client's decisions. The result is more sales, higher margins and more efficient use of capital, all with a fraction of the work.", 'Welcome to the new way to operate e-commerce businesses!', 'For more information, visit flieber.com.']

['Who We Are', 'Homeowners invest their time, money and dreams to create the perfect space to call home. Founded in 2006 by Nancy Peterson, HomeStars is Canada’s #1 marketplace dedicated to helping homeowners research, connect with, and hire the best and most reliable home service pros.', 'Our proprietary algorithm connects hundreds of thousands of homeowners each year with the right pro for the job. Our review-\xadbased platform is the online alternative to traditional word-\xadof-\xad mouth, enabling our network of 60K+ pros to showcase their business for growth.', 'Speaking of growth, we’re expanding our team, and we need your help!', 'WHY JOIN US ', 'HomeStars is looking to continue to build a positive, winning culture and that starts with hiring great people like you! If you are looking to be part of something great, work on a dynamic and growing team, we want to hear from you.', 'Perks of working at HomeStars ', ' We are growing fast. HomeStars is part of the ANGI Homeservices Inc. family which is public and includes top home service brands like Home Advisor and Angie’s List.', ' Excellent Benefits Package. We want a healthy and productive team.', '\xad Company-wide social events and team-building activities.', ' December Break. The office is closed the week before New Year’s.', ' Personal Growth. ['Kijiji is the #1 online classifieds site in Canada. As one of Canada’s top 10 most-visited digital properties, we reach more than half of Canadian internet users monthly. We’re a leader in helping Canadians find and trade goods and services in their local communities, including Autos, Real Estate and Jobs. We’re proud of our engaged, ambitious and collaborative culture, and we were recently named one of the top Toronto Tech Employer Brands.2 Our stylish office is located in the historic King and Spadina neighborhood in Toronto’s hub of innovation.', "We are currently searching for a business process analyst to join our sales excellence team. In this position, you will evolve and co-ordinate scalable support processes that remove complexity and inefficiency so that our business' salesforce can succeed. We are looking for someone who enjoys using technical skills, data analysis, and creativity to overcome business problems.", 'Responsibilities:', 'Build, coordinate, evaluate and optimize new and existing sales processes', 'Drive initiatives to improve usage, capabilities and data hygiene of our CRM', 'Extract and make sense of data to translate it for the business', 'Maintain existing dashboards and sales reports; crafting new reports as needed', 'Assign and generate leads lists for sales teams', 'Support compliance, analysis, and refinement of sales policies', 'Monitor and recommend changes to sales territories', 'Import and export data feeds from 3rd party partners', 'Align everyday tasks to established company priorities', 'Job Requirements: ', ' ', 'Bachelor’s degree in engineering, business, or other relevant subject areas', 'Business sense; a customer-mindset and understanding of how the company meets its goals', 'Process-oriented; a knack for optimization, finding opportunities, automation and staying one step ahead of potential problems', 'Growth-oriented; eager and able to learn a broad range of topics with a hands-on approach', 'Standout Colleague; eager to build positive and productive relationships with a wide range of colleagues', ' ', 'Communication skills:\xa0\xa0ability to speak and write in a structured manner ', 'Analytical:\xa0 \xa0deftly turn data into information and insights while maintaining a high standard of data accuracy', ' ', 'Intellectual curiosity:\xa0 look beyond the obvious and don’t stop at first answers', "Self-starter: doesn't need to be told what to do next, jumps in and takes action", 'Professional; responsive, accountable and carries a positive work attitude', 'Problem solver; comfort with ambiguity, ability to break down large complex issues into components ', 'Preferred Qualifications ', '1-2 years of relevant work experience. New graduates are encouraged to apply.', 'Proficiency in 1+ scripting language (e.g., R, Python, VBA, C++, etc.)', 'Experience with of applying statistics to quantitative analysis', 'Ability to write SQL queries', 'Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau', 'Experience with SalesForce CRM', 'Experience with writing technical documents or documenting process flows', ' ', 'About the team: Classifieds is shaping the future of local commerce by bringing people together through an enriched online experience that allows them to work closely with the community around them. We are comprised of more than 1,000 people who are passionate about local trade and maintaining the customer-centric nature of the Group, while exploring growth opportunities in both the countries where eBay Classifieds Group already has a presence and in prospective markets.', ' ', 'Benefits:\xa0 ', 'Benefits are an essential part of your total compensation for the work you do every day. Whether you’re single, in a growing family, or nearing retirement, eBay offers a variety of comprehensive and competitive benefit programs to meet your needs. Including maternal & paternal leave, paid sabbatical, and plans to help ensure your financial security today and in the years ahead because we know feeling financially secure during your working years and through retirement is important.', ' ', 'We love building opportunities for others by connecting people from widely diverse backgrounds, perspectives, and geographies. So, being diverse and inclusive isn’t just something we strive for, it is who we are, and part of what we do each and every single day. To learn about our Diversity & Inclusion click here: https://www.ebayinc.com/our-company/diversity-inclusion/.']

['Our Financial Services Client is looking for an Data Manager who will take a leading role in the development of Enterprise Data strategy, architecture, policies and governance structure and will support the Senior Vice President of Information Technology in taking a strategic approach to choosing the right processes, technologies and resources to be implemented and embedded within their rapidly growing organization.', 'The Data Manager will be responsible for all aspects of data governance developing the overall data architecture strategy, creating and maintaining standards and best practices for data provisioning and data integration, enterprise data modelling and design. cross-referencing and metadata', ' ', 'Develop and maintain an integration layer in the target platform and standardize ingested source data into an enterprise data warehouse', ' ', 'Establish a BI/Reporting/Data Visualization layer with a streamlined set of BI tool(s) ', ' ', 'Work with key stakeholders across the business to develop and manage key master data business processes, ensuring structures', ' ', 'Implementation of system improvements and new technologies aimed at data storage, profiling, processing, management and integration into business applications', ' ', 'Facilitate the establishment of change management processes to govern data input and maintenance, data stewardship and access control', ' ', 'Recommendations for improvements and platform development to meet
