['Minimum Qualifications', ' ', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.", ' ', '10 years of B2B technology marketing or field marketing experience. ', ' ', '5 years of marketing and team leadership experience.', ' ', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' ', 'Experience building and leading a distributed regional team and managing highly leveraged, measurable marketing initiatives in a global, fast paced environment. ', ' ', 'Knowledge of the Canadian market and considerations for cloud and technology vendors.', ' ', 'Exceptional project management skills and experience. ', ' ', 'Innovative and fresh thinking aligning to Google campaign standards; independent, self-starter who can prioritize and drive deliverables to execution with minimal supervision. ', ' ', 'Excellent communication and influencing skills in both business and technical situations.', ' ', 'Ability to speak and write in French fluently and idiomatically.', ' ', 'About The Job', 'Google is developing groundbreaking cloud solutions for companies, leveraging years of experience in building secure, reliable, and scalable cloud technology. With excellent Google differentiation in data analytics and machine learning, security, application development and collaboration software, we’re well on our way -- but we need more people who can help us write and tell that story. If you’re as excited about building what’s next as we are, Google Cloud is the place for you.', "You are a Marketing Lead who will run Regional Marketing for Cloud in Canada. You'll be leading a team of professional marketers driving Google Cloud awareness, new business acquisition, customer development and user community programs. You will manage the strategy and execution across a wide array of programs; including campaigns, account-based-marketing, Google owned events, and third-party sponsorships. You'll help large businesses move fast and innovate with cloud services, from collaboration tools to infrastructure-as-a-service. You’ll shape the future of how technology is used in the workplace and be part of an entrepreneurial team in one of Google’s fastest-growing businesses. With extended ownership of Canadian business growth goals, you’ll craft and execute programs with a focus on driving pipeline and business growth. You will not only be adept at building relationships and navigating a large cross functional organization, but will also be skilled at flawless execution of the programs.", 'Google Cloud helps millions of employees and organizations empower their employees, serve their customers, and build what’s next for their business — all with technology built in the cloud. Our products are engineered for security, reliability and scalability, running the full stack from infrastructure to applications to devices and hardware. And our teams are dedicated to helping our customers and developers see the benefits of our technology come to life.', 'Responsibilities', ' ', 'Define the Canadian Cloud marketing strategy and programs, working closely with global marketing and Cloud Leadership teams while representing the local voice of the customers in the process. Work with Sales teams on scalable enterprise marketing programs across multiple segments, channels and partners.', ' ', 'Execute, rollout and optimize demand generation and sales acceleration campaigns aligned to horizontal and vertical solutions including Google Cloud events, C-level engagement campaigns, third-party trade shows and customer stories.', ' ', 'Enable partners to scale coverage for Google Cloud Services and build community programs to build deep loyalty with end users and advocates.', ' ', 'Inspire the team and deliver ambitious growth in Canada by attracting and retaining exceptional marketers. Grow awareness, familiarity and perception for Google Cloud in Canada.', ' ', "At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form ."]

['Data Engineer', 'On behalf of our client in the Telco Sector, PROCOM is looking for a Data Engineer.', 'Data Engineer – Job Description', ' ', 'As a Data Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, building and running the data driven applications which enable innovative, customer centric digital experiences.', ' ', 'You will be working as part of a friendly, cross-discipline agile team who helps each other solve problems across all functions.', ' ', 'As a custodian of customer trust, you will employ best practice in development, security, accessibility and design to achieve the highest quality of service for our customers.', ' ', 'Our development team uses a range of technologies to get the job done: Spark, Sqoop and coupled with Oozie, shell scripting, Control-M to provide a modern, easy to use data pipeline.', ' ', 'You will be part of the team building a data pipeline to transfer the data from our enterprise data lake for enabling our AI use cases.', ' ', 'You are a fast learner, highly technical, passionate data engineer looking to work within a team of multidisciplinary experts to improve your craft and contribute to the data development practice.', ' ', 'Learn new skills & advance your data development practice', ' ', 'Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve the analytics pipeline', ' ', 'Assist in evaluating technology choices and rapidly test solutions', ' ', 'Assist the outcome teams in understanding how to best measure their web properties', ' ', 'Collaborate closely with multiple team in an agile environment', ' ', 'Data Engineer – Mandatory Skills', ' ', '5+ years of extensive experience in Informatica, Control-m, Big Data analysis, design and development', ' ', 'Extensive experience in deep data analysis, strong SQL skills,', ' ', 'Extensive experience in Tableau design and development; dashboards, static/dynamic reports', ' ', 'Data Engineer – Nice To Have Skills', ' ', 'Intermediate level candidates with 4-6 years of relevant experience', ' ', 'Experience with Big data related tools and technologies', ' ', 'Experience with SQL, Unix, Shell scripting', ' ', 'Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau, Domo', ' ', 'Data Engineer - Assignment Start Date', 'ASAP – 6 months to start', 'Data Engineer - Assignment Location', 'Scarborough, ON']

['President, KhureHealth', 'Khure Health is rapidly growing health technology company and an emerging leader in rare disease and speciality conditions. Through proprietary clinical dashboards and deep analytical tools, Khure Health allows physicians to quickly understand complex, high-risk patients and place them on the right care pathways.\xa0', 'Khure Health is looking for an enthusiastic and entrepreneurial leader to help lead the company at this early growth stage of the business.\xa0 The Khure Health platform allows physicians to identify misdiagnosed and undiagnosed patients in their practice using proprietary algorithms and machine learning techniques.\xa0 The result is that patients with rare and specialty conditions get the care they need faster, lives are saved, Doctors feel better supported and the pharmaceutical sector gets proper utilization of their therapies.', 'As President, you will own the P&L as well as the operational execution of the business.\xa0', 'The successful candidate will have an entrepreneurial spirit at their core and excel at keeping an eye on the long-term goals while rolling up their sleeves to help with the multiple short-term projects and priorities that compete for attention. In addition, you must have demonstrated abilities in building effective teams and scaling complex products.', 'This is an exciting time to join the Khure Health team. Khure Health, a joint venture between DoctorCare and Brainsparq, is in a period of tremendous growth and we are excited by the opportunities around us.\xa0', 'This position is located at our office in downtown Toronto.', 'Your Near Term Challenges:', '●\xa0 \tQuickly come up to speed on KhureHealth’s existing technology, partnerships, and product offering', '●\xa0 \tManage multiple live projects, leading stakeholder relations of our pharmaceutical partners as well as oversee our growing network of several hundred physician customers', '●\xa0 \tReview and work with the Ownership team to refine the ‘scale-up’ plan', '●\xa0 \tOversee our existing high performing team and continue to identify product & HR needs as we scale across the country', '●\xa0 \tMonitor and be responsible for all business KPIs\xa0', 'Here’s What You Offer:', 'You’re Entrepreneurial', '. You are excited by designing, launching and running high quality products. You try new ideas. You learn. You innovate.', 'You Hustle', '. You are able to independently identify what needs to get done and have a bias towards action.', 'You’re Humble', '. You are able to remove ego from discussions and identify the best solutions.\xa0 You are able to honestly reflect on your own weaknesses and look for ways to improve.', 'You’re Smart', '. You are able to quickly apply new knowledge to foreign situations and contribute to a high performing team.', 'You Lead.', ' You provide leadership to teams through your actions and support to your team members. You lead by example.', '\xa0', 'Primary Responsibilities & Activities:', '●\xa0 \tProvide clear direction to all direct reports and obtain results using a participative management style', '●\xa0 \tManage day-to-day operations and P&L', '●\xa0 \tComplete budgets, forecasts, and reports', '●\xa0 \tEnsure delivery of established targets', '●\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Lead continuous improvement activity and culture to solve problems and increase efficiency of team and operations', '●\xa0 \tHire, train, develop and evaluate Khure Health team members', '●\xa0 \tMaintain close working relationships with customers and stakeholders', '●\xa0 \tConduct analysis on issues impacting operations and proactively identify opportunities for improvement', '●\xa0 \tDocument, establish, and improve processes and procedures to drive scalability and effectiveness within Khure Health', '●\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Develop documentation and internal training on product operations', '●\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 With input from the Board of Directors,\xa0 develop and maintain strategic plans, product development, workflow optimization, restructurings and building relationships with stakeholders', 'Requirements/Competencies:', '●\xa0 \tBachelor’s degree (or higher) in business or sciences', '●\xa0 \tAt least 4+ years of senior healthcare experience in the healthcare industry\xa0', '●\xa0 \tDemonstrated experience in managing people and products', '●\xa0 \tStrong team skills and the ability to work effectively with internal and external groups', '●\xa0 \tExcellent organizational, interpersonal, time management and communication skills', '●\xa0 \tAn entrepreneurial orientation with attention to details', '●\xa0 \tAbility to understand electronic medical record systems, analytic tools and make business decisions', '●\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Self-driven: Can exceed goals under minimal supervision', 'Job Type: Full Time', '\xa0', 'You can learn more about Khure Health here: https://www.khurehealth.com', 'You can learn about the DoctorCare team here: https://www.doctorcare.ca/about/our-team/', '\xa0', 'Khure Health is an equal opportunity employer that welcomes all applicants including persons with disabilities, visible minorities, women and aboriginals. Khure Health will provide reasonable accommodation to qualified job applicants with a disability, upon request, and will notify successful applicants of policies relating to the accommodation of employees with disabilities.\xa0 We would like to thank all applicants for your interest in Khure Health, but please note that only successful candidates will be contacted.']

['Senior Director, Perception', 'Magic Leap is an eclectic group of people who share a magical vision of the future. And we’re growing.', 'Our mission is to harmonize people and technology to create a better, more unified world. Our vision is to amplify the best parts of you and to advance the human spirit.', 'Job Description', 'We have an exciting opportunity on our Software team for a strong leader with exceptional development/research skills in the field of Computer Vision and Machine Learning. The Senior Director will be part of the senior leadership team in Perception organization. He/She will be primarily responsible to lead and drive the research and development of multiple core perception components across multiple organizations spanning beyond the Perception team. The candidate’s responsibilities extend to working closely with the executive team to establish the scope and schedule of the product critical projects, drive the formation of technical teams and ensure a cohesive alignment of all essential technical expertise by setting optimal communication strategies. The candidate must come with world-recognized expertise in at least one of the following core technical areas of geometric vision and machine learning: sensor calibration (cameras, IMUs, displays), visual-inertial odometry, dense environment mapping, eye tracking, 3D scene understanding. The candidate will take an active deciding role in release planning, scheduling, and assigning individual developers within their technical team. Qualified candidates will be driven self-starters, robust thinkers, strong collaborators, effective leaders and adept at operating in a highly dynamic environment. We look for colleagues that are passionate about our product and embody our values.', 'Responsibilities', ' ', 'Provide leadership and mentoring to the research and development team within the Perception team.', ' ', 'Lead the research and development effort of advanced product-critical computer vision and deep learning components covering key product critical perception features such as head pose tracking, eye tracking, environment mapping, sensor calibration, long-term and large scale localization, object recognition and scene understanding.', ' ', 'Lead a team of engineers and researchers and manage them to deliver the features from research to product.', ' ', 'Define and execute the roadmap of new features.', ' ', 'Actively contribute to Magic Leap Intellectual Property and publish the research findings in peer-reviewed conferences.', ' ', 'Work hand-in-hand with the key stakeholders and developers across the company using computer vision components.', ' ', 'Support overall research engineering and architecture efforts of computer vision and machine learning components.', ' ', 'Act as a mentor and subject matter expert within the Perception team and with other key stakeholders.', ' ', 'Qualifications', ' ', '15+ years of working experience in Perception research and/or targeted product development.', ' ', '10+ years working as a manager and leading engineering teams.', ' ', 'Experience leading engineering teams from first concept to ship.', ' ', 'World recognized expert knowledge and strong leadership experience in Computer Vision with extensive publication record and specialization in at least one of the following domains:', ' ', 'Sensor Calibration:', ' Design and implement algorithms for online and offline intrinsic and extrinsic calibration of complex devices composed of several sensors, cameras, IMUs, depth sensors, and imagers. Collaborate with other engineers on the design and deployment of fully automatic robotics-aided calibration processes targeted for factory production.', ' ', 'Visual-Inertial Odometry:', ' Design and implement advanced algorithms for estimating the 6DOF pose of a head-mounted device by optimally fusing visual and inertial measurements collected from multiple cameras and IMUs.', ' ', 'Long-term and Large scale mapping: ', 'Design and implement advanced algorithms for large scale mapping to extend computer vision spaces to large areas.', ' ', 'Dense Environment Mapping:', ' Design and implement advanced algorithms for reconstructing dense 3D models of large-scale indoor environments using depth sensors.', ' ', 'Scene Understanding and Semantics:', ' Design and implement segmentation algorithms based on depth, motion or texture data. Build algorithms to understand the environment and add semantic meaning on real-world objects.', ' ', 'Eye Tracking:', ' Design and implement advanced algorithms for real-time stereoscopic eye vergence tracking.', ' ', 'Perception algorithms on cloud:', ' Research, architect, and implement high-performance computer vision software in the cloud with state-of-the-art capabilities.', ' ', ' ', 'Expert level in C/C++/OpenCV (programming and debugging).', ' ', 'Experience in Deep Learning is strongly preferred with knowledge of at least one of TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Caffe.', ' ', 'Education', ' ', 'MS in Computer Science or Electrical Engineering (with a minimum of 17 years of relevant experience).', ' ', 'Ph.D. is preferred (with a minimum of 15 years of relevant experience).', ' ', 'Additional Information', ' ', 'All your information will be kept confidential according to Equal Employment Opportunities guidelines.']

['Join SADA as a Data Engineer!', 'Your Mission ', 'As a Data Engineer at SADA, you will work collaboratively with architects and other engineers to recommend, prototype, build and debug data infrastructures on Google Cloud Platform (GCP). You will have an opportunity to work on real-world data issues facing our customers today. Engagements vary from being purely consultative to requiring heavy hands-on work and cover a diverse array of domain areas, such as data migrations, data archival and disaster recovery, and big data analytics solutions requiring a combination of batch or streaming data pipelines, data lakes and data warehouses.', 'You will be recognized as an established contributor by your team. You will contribute design and implementation components for multiple projects. You will work mostly independently with limited oversight. You will also participate in client-facing discussions in areas of expertise.', 'Pathway to Success ', '#BeOneStepAhead: At SADA Systems we are in the business of change. We are focused on leading-edge technology that is ever-evolving. We embrace change enthusiastically and encourage adaptability. This means that not only do our engineers understand that change is inevitable, but they embrace this change to continuously broaden their skills, preparing for future customer needs.', 'Your success comes from your enthusiasm, insight, and positive impact. You will be given direct feedback quarterly with respect to the scope and quality of your contributions, your ability to estimate accurately, customer feedback at the close of projects, your collaboration with your peers, and the consultative skill you demonstrate in customer interactions.', 'As you continue to execute successfully, we will build a personalized development plan together that leads you through the engineering or management growth tracks.', 'Expectations', 'Required Travel - 30% travel to customer sites, conferences, and other related events', 'Customer Facing - You will interact with customers on a regular basis, sometimes daily, other times weekly/bi-weekly. Common touchpoints occur when qualifying potential opportunities, at project kickoff, throughout the engagement as progress is communicated, and at project close. You can expect to interact with a range of customer stakeholders, including engineers, technical project managers, and executives.', 'Training - Ongoing with a first-week orientation at HQ followed by a 90-day onboarding schedule. Details of the timeline can be shared.', 'Required Credentials', 'Job Requirements', ' Google Professional Data Engineer Certified or able to complete within the first 45 days of employment ', 'Required Qualifications', ' Expertise in at least one of the following domain areas:', ' Data warehouse modernization: building complete data warehouse solutions, including technical architectures, star/snowflake schema designs, infrastructure components, ETL/ELT pipelines, and reporting/analytic tools. Must have hands-on experience working with batch or streaming data processing software (such as Beam, Airflow, Hadoop, Spark, Hive).', ' Data migration: migrating data stores to reliable and scalable cloud-based stores, including strategies for near zero-downtime. ', ' Backup, restore & disaster recovery: building production-grade data backup and restore, and disaster recovery solutions. Up to petabytes in scale. ', ' Experience writing software in one or more languages such as Python, Java, Scala, or Go', ' Experience building production-grade data solutions (relational and NoSQL)', ' Experience with systems monitoring/alerting, capacity planning and performance tuning', ' Experience in technical consulting or other customer-facing role', 'Useful Qualifications', ' Experience working with Google Cloud data products (CloudSQL, Spanner, Cloud Storage, Pub/Sub, Dataflow, Dataproc, Bigtable, BigQuery, Dataprep, Composer, etc)', ' Experience with IoT architectures and building real-time data streaming pipelines', ' Applied experience operationalizing machine learning models on large datasets', ' Knowledge and understanding of industry trends and new technologies and ability to apply trends to architectural needs', ' Demonstrated leadership and self-direction -- a willingness to teach others and learn new techniques', ' Demonstrated skills in selecting the right statistical tools given a data analysis problem', 'About SADA', 'Values:', ' We built our core values on themes that internally compel us to deliver our best to our partners, our customers and to each other. Ensuring a diverse and inclusive workplace where we learn from each other is core to SADA’s values. We welcome people of different backgrounds, experiences, abilities and perspectives. We are an equal opportunity employer.', ' Make them rave', ' Be data driven', ' Be one step ahead', ' Be a change agent ', ' Do the right thing', 'Work with the best', ': SADA has been the largest partner in North America for GCP since 2016 and recently announced, at Google NEXT, as the 2018 Global Partner of the Year . SADA has also been awarded Best Place to Work by Inc. as well as LA Business Journal!', 'Benefits', ': Unlimited PTO , competitive and attractive compensation, performance-based bonuses, paid holidays, rich medical, dental, vision plans, life, short and long-term disability insurance, RRSP, professional development reimbursement program as well as Google Certified training programs.', 'Business Performance:', ' SADA has been named to the INC 5000 Fastest-Growing Private Companies list for 12 years in a row garnering Honoree status. CRN has also named SADA on the Top 500 Global Solutions Providers for the past 5 years. The overall culture continues to evolve with engineering at its core: 3200+ projects completed, 3000+ customers served, 10K+ workloads and 25M+ users migrated to the cloud.']

['Data Engineer', 'Competitive salary, bonuses, & equity', 'Cutting edge technology', 'About Our Client', 'HealthTech company in Downtown Toronto.', 'Job Description', 'Design, build, and manage complex data infrastructure ', 'Handle data sets from multiple soruces and generate key insights from the data', 'Develop data lake components, large scale ETL pipelines, data warehousing, and visualization', 'The Successful Applicant', '5+ years of Software Development/Data Engineering experience', 'Experience with Python, at least one modern Big Data technology, and AWS', 'Experience in data mapping and modelling', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent", "What's On Offer", 'Competitive compensation package', 'Benefits', 'Bonuses', 'Flexible hours', 'Contact: Emily Sneddon', 'Quote job ref: 1402438']

['Why Join Coca-Cola North America??', 'It?s an exciting time to work in The Coca-Cola Company?s flagship market. We?re accelerating our momentum as the fastest-growing large consumer goods company in North America by putting people at the heart of our business and everything we do ? whether we?re innovating to give consumers the drinks and packaging sizes they want, or building our eCommerce capabilities. People are our focus when we?re collaborating with our diverse network of locally-connected bottling partners, and when we?re returning every drop of water we use to communities and nature. And people ? with the different backgrounds, skills and perspectives they bring to our workplace ? are helping transform our business, one big idea at a time. We empower our employees to challenge the status quo, make bold recommendations, experiment and adapt, so we can grow together and make a great business even better.', 'This role is a 1 year mat leave contract*', 'Job Summary', 'The Insights Manager is responsible for providing strategic thought leadership through accurate, actionable, and applied insights.? They collaborate with the Business Unit team members to identify the appropriate learning needs (syndicated and custom) for the business and commission custom research as required.? They will be responsible for driving new, innovative ideas based on insights and commercial viability (establishing there is consumer and customer demand, unique points of difference versus the competitive set, can become a sustainable concept).', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Leverages various information sources and identifies business issues impacting the brand and commercial actions.? Provides a strong, informed point of view on how to resolve the issue using research and/or commercial best practices.', 'Supports yearly business planning process through comprehensive summary and implications of past learning, Market Intelligence & Competitive Intelligence to feed the Situation Assessment phase (beginning) of planning.', 'Works collaboratively with Category Advisory to support the CBP process with shopper insights', 'Identifies the need to conduct custom research in order to address specific business issues.? Projects range from foundational learning on consumer/shopper/ brands/competitors (qualitative & quantitative), price/pack/product optimization studies (on-line conjoint, CLT, IHUT and in-market), impact studies (source of volume, trial & repeat, TURF, Market Mix, etc.), pre-market creative evaluation, post-market creative tracking;', 'Provides coaching/guidance to BU teams in self-serve insight resources such as Bev360 (Brand Health) and CBL (Consumer Beverage Landscape) databases, the CCV data mining tool and syndicated tools (Five)', 'Identifies and recommends best in class suppliers and research methodologies through industry and TCCC linkages Manages and prioritizes Nielsen Analyst? projects in accordance with BU priorities', 'Manages research suppliers to ensure data integrity, quality of delivery, and increased proficiency in storytelling capabilities', 'Job Requirements/Qualifications', 'At least 5-7 years in the Consumer Packaged Goods Industry, with substantial experience in Consumer, Brand, or Market Research', 'Strong analytic skills, with the ability to gather and synthesize data from multiple sources, interpret it and turn it into actionable insights', 'Consumer & Shopper Knowledge: Knowledge of consumer need states, shopping behaviour, trends, and cohort dynamics to effectively target marketing and merchandising efforts', 'Solid knowledge of different research techniques including the ability to design research approaches, sampling techniques and research protocols', 'Strong collaboration, influencing, prioritization and time management skills to service a large group of internal stakeholders/suppliers with potentially conflicting priorities.', 'Demonstrated verbal and written presentation capabilities; proficient with Microsoft PowerPoint, Excel and Word', 'Solid knowledge of mainstream quantitative analytic techniques (e.g., survey methods, segmentation, factor analyses, conjoint) used in market research', 'Comfortable with seeking out, recommending and employing emerging research techniques/methodologies to adapt to changing consumer/shopper trends (example: strategic/tactical social listening, on-line focus groups/bulletin boards, mobile research, virtual research, neuroscience, etc.)', 'Solid project management skills with ability to collaborate with key stakeholders (internal & external) and meet established timelines.', 'Solid capability in data mining and comfortable adopting data delivery platforms (TCCC-proprietary and Nielsen Answers Desktop/Workstation+)', 'Educational Requirements', 'University/Bachelor?s Degree', 'MBA preferred', 'Competencies - Leader Of Others', 'Develop Self and Others', 'Act like an Owner', 'Collaborate with System, Customer and Stakeholders', 'Drive Innovation', 'Inspire Others', 'Leadership Behaviors', 'DRIVE INNOVATION: Generate new or unique solutions and embrace new ideas that help sustain our business (encompassing everything from continuous improvement to new product and package innovation).', 'COLLABORATE WITH SYSTEM, CUSTOMERS, AND OTHER STAKEHOLDERS: Develop and leverage relationships with stakeholders to approximately stretch and impact the System (Company and Bottler).', 'ACT LIKE AN OWNER: Deliver results, creating value for our Brands, our System, our customers, and key stakeholders.', 'INSPIRE OTHERS: Inspire people to deliver our mission and 2020 Vision, demonstrate passion for the business and give people a reason to believe anything is possible.', "DEVELOP SELF AND OTHERS: Develop self and support others' development to achieve full potential.", 'Travel Requirements', '10-20%', 'Relocation: ', 'Not provided', 'Coca-Cola Ltd. is committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workforce.? We have a number of programs and policies in place to support this goal. For individuals with disabilities, accommodations are available upon request. Should you require an accommodation, please contact our HR team by calling 1-877-677-6774.', 'Our Growth Culture', 'One of the reasons our company continues to thrive after 130+ years is having a company culture that supports and rewards behaviors that lead to growth. Our “Growth Behaviors,” as we call them, are ways of being and working that help to make us successful. Think about how you can bring this to life in your next role at Coca-Cola.', 'Curious', 'Keep seeking, never settle. Staying curious about what is outside, and two steps ahead inspires us to challenge the status quo. Having the courage to look and leap is the way we grow. Because asking “what if?” pushes us to the next level as people and as a company.', 'Empowered', 'Make it happen', '.', ' True empowerment is the result of taking responsibility. This means giving yourself permission to see it, say it and do it, and owning the outcomes. Because we move forward faster when we all take action.', 'Version 1.0, 2.0, 3.0', 'Push for progress, not perfection. There are very few overnight successes. Greatness is borne of many little victories (and failures). Share v 1.0, test it, and make it better. Then create the next version. Because the moment we think something is perfect, it will be obsolete.', 'Inclusive', 'Include, value and trust each other. We are smart alone but together we are genius. This means being inclusive, giving the benefit of the doubt and being responsible for each other. Because, for our company to thrive for the next 100+ years, smart isn’t enough. We need genius.', 'We are an Equal Opportunity Employer and do not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, sex, age, national origin, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, status as a veteran, and basis of disability or any other federal, state or local protected class.?', 'R-38880']

JOB TITLE: ['Senior Program Manager- Data Supply Chain & AI- TELUS Digital']
JOB DECSRIPTION: ['Create Awesome Experiences For Our Customers.', 'Join our team', 'We’re a customer-driven and product-minded team within TELUS, responsible for our company’s digital evolution. We simplify the path to production so teams can focus on what matters most.', 'TELUS Digital’s mission is to make life easier for millions of customers – and for our team. We build smart, customer-centric and data-driven experiences for telus.com, TELUS.com/business and the My TELUS app.', 'Our team includes a passionate group of strategists, UX and visual designers, full stack developers, content managers, scrum masters, testers, product owners, people experience specialists, and other digital experts.', 'Our team members are leaders in local and global technology communities, we value and support communities such as: Tech Masters, NodeSchool, Ladies Learning Code, Women Who Code TO and many more!', 'Learn more about our team at telus.com/digital', 'This is a full-time position.', 'Here’s the impact you’ll make and what we’ll accomplish together', 'The Data Supply Chain & AI team is passionate about enabling TELUS teams to have easy access to high quality, secure, centralized data by building and evolving big data/ AI products such as data lake, Unified customer identity records, Master Data Management, ACE, Google cloud platform. Highly motivated and driven, we strive to transform and educate TELUS to become a best-in-class, data-driven company, resulting in transformational outcomes in a superior customer experience, increased revenue, cost savings and avoidance.', 'We are looking for a seasoned individual with strategic insights and in-depth program management skills to lead a team that continues to push the envelope of innovation in the AI space across consumer wireless and wireline business.', 'You will lead a cross functional team to develop and deliver on a robust AI roadmap aligned with a clear understanding of the change management and business outcomes.', 'Here’s how', ' ', 'Own integrated marketing AI roadmap inclusive of technical implementation and change management between home solutions and mobility lines of business', ' ', 'Translate complex technical solutions to business outcomes and vice versa for manager and director level stakeholders', ' ', 'Develop a strategic vision and correlating priorities to lead the team through delivery in conjunction with mobility and home solution owners', ' ', 'Clear executive level and program team level updates to provide clarity on implementation progress and be able to navigate and lead through areas of grey', ' ', 'Analyze data to make decision and problem solve through risks and issues with the broader program team', ' ', 'Primary Location', 'CA-ON-Toronto', 'Schedule', 'Full-time', "You're the missing piece of the puzzle", ' ', '10 years program and/or project management of major, complex engagements managing cross functional programs and stakeholder groups', ' ', 'Solid background/ understanding of machine learning and AI implementation', ' ', 'Demonstrated knowledge of TELUS wireline and/or wireless products and supporting datasets', ' ', 'Thorough understanding of project management methodologies, principles and practices', ' ', 'Experienced in navigating through executive-level conversations with a keen ability to communicate and translate complex technical solutions to business outcomes and vice versa', ' ', 'Comfortable leading in a continuously changing, dynamic environment', ' ', 'Great-to-haves', ' ', 'PMP designation would be considered an asset', ' ', 'Working knowledge of JIRA', ' ', 'Undergraduate degree in one of Computer Science, Software Engineering, Business, Engineering or Technical Discipline or equivalent education', ' ', 'Who is TELUS?', "We're a high-performing team of individuals who collectively make TELUS one of the leading telecommunications companies in Canada. Our competitive consumer offerings include wireline, wireless, internet and Optik TV™. We also deliver a compelling range of products and services for small, medium and large businesses; and have carved out a leadership position in the health, energy, finance and public sector markets with innovative industry specific solutions.", 'Everyone belongs at TELUS. It doesn’t matter who you are, what you do or how you do it, at TELUS, your unique contribution and talents will be valued and respected. Because the more diverse perspectives we have the more likely we are to crack the code on what our customers want and our communities need.', 'Do you share our passion?', 'At TELUS, ', 'you ', 'create future friendly® possibilities.', 'At TELUS, we are committed to diversity and equitable access to employment opportunities based on ability.']

['Position Summary', 'Under the general direction of the Director, Digital Solutions, the Manager, Emerging Technologies leverages technology and supporting capabilities to help “the business” optimize the way it operates and delivers value (global citizens with the knowledge and skills to lead and innovate) to the community. This role is key to achieving the mandate of supporting digital innovation within the organization and continuing to improve the organization’s core technology operations. Areas of focus include application administration, artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning; digital identification and payment systems (ONECard); virtual and augmented reality; virtual digital assistants and chatbots; and workflow automation. It also supports/enables Humber’s research initiatives. The role pursues solutions that make people’s lives better.', 'Hours Per Week', '37.5', 'Position Type', 'FT Administration', 'Work Locations', 'North Campus', 'Job Family', 'Information Technology', 'Deadline to Apply', 'March 20, 2020', 'Job Posting', '2/26/20', 'Department', 'Information Technology Services', 'Qualifications', 'The successful candidate will hold a Master’s Degree in Computer Science, Information Management Science or equivalent from a recognized educational institution and will be Foundations certified in ITIL v3, an Agile Certified Practitioner from the Project Management Institute and have certification in Problem Management from a recognized authority. The successful candidate will have at minimum 7 years working experience including experience in a large IT environment and with a large client base along with knowledge of academic research methodologies. Strong leadership, management and communication skills are required as is the ability to work under pressure.', 'We thank all applicants for their interest in this position. Only applicants selected for an interview will be contacted.', 'Humber College is committed to a workforce that reflects the diversity of our students and our city. We actively seek qualified individuals from equity seeking groups with demonstrated skills and knowledge to deal with all aspects of equity, diversity and inclusion in a post-secondary environment. Humber College is committed to accommodating applicants with disabilities throughout the hiring process, in accordance with the Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act (AODA). Our HR Generalists will work with applicants requesting accommodations at any stage of the hiring process. This document is available in alternate formats upon request.']

['About Us ', 'Deep Genomics is a Toronto-based startup company that is building an AI-powered discovery and development platform to significantly expand the universe of medicines available for genetically-defined diseases. Founded in 2015, Deep Genomics brings together a multidisciplinary team of world-leading experts in machine learning, genomics, chemistry, and biology. Together we are on a mission to rapidly discover and develop oligonucleotide drugs for the treatment of patients with severe disorders of the liver, central nervous system, and eye.', 'Ideal Candidate', 'We are seeking a Laboratory Assistant to help our growing, fast paced team! Working closely with both our laboratory and operations teams, you will help us with day to day administrative and laboratory tasks. We are looking for a helpful, organized, and hardworking individual, with a flexible attitude to job roles.', ' Job Responsibilities ', 'Daily ordering, receiving and organization of laboratory supplies', 'Shipment tracking and customs clearances as necessary', 'Reconciliation of payments and invoices', 'Regular maintenance of laboratory equipment', 'Organization and inventory of chemicals, reagents, general supplies and cold storage', 'Assisting researchers with routine experiments', 'Scheduling services with external vendors', ' Requirements ', "Bachelor's Degree (life sciences preferred)", '1-3 years of experience working in life sciences or medical environment preferred ', 'Familiarity with office management procedures and basic accounting principles', 'Intermediate level knowledge of MS Office ', 'Superlative communication and interpersonal abilities', 'A keen attention to detail and excellent organizational skills', ' What We Offer ', 'A highly competitive salary and meaningful equity compensation.', 'Exceptional opportunities for learning and growth. ', 'A bright, collegial, highly-motivated team working at the intersection of the most exciting areas of science and technology.', 'Deep Genomics thanks all applicants, however only those selected for an interview will be contacted.', 'Deep Genomics welcomes and encourages applications from people with disabilities. Accommodations are available on request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process.']

['Business Intelligence Specialist', 'Business Planning and\xa0Strategy\xa0Division', 'Full-time Permanent', 'Target Hiring Range $75,194 - $87,727', '\xa0', 'Position Profile:', 'The Ontario Hospital Association (OHA)’s 2018-2021 Strategic Plan includes a bold new vision for the OHA as an organization that will “improve the availability and effective use of data and analytics to help support better performance”. For the past year, we had developed a suite of data analytics tools for our hospital members. Over the next two years, we will continue to strengthen our foundation for achieving this vision, through building additional tools and the team to enable impactful, member-facing analytics solutions.', 'Critical areas in which OHA supports its members are with respect to funding, performance and various drivers of hospitals’ operational and financial health.\xa0As such, OHA is an active participant in shaping health system funding policy, changes in delivery models, human resource management and other factors affecting the business of health care delivery.\xa0Hospitals’ ability to successfully predict funding and manage their financial health is increasingly dependent on timely and accurate analytics-enabled insights about their performance and volumes relative to peers.\xa0Working closely with subject matter experts, the Business Intelligence Specialist will help enable this work through the design of data visualizations and the creation of reporting solutions that deliver high-value insights to hospitals.\xa0', 'The Position:', 'The Business Intelligence Specialist will be under the Data & Analytics team, you will be called on to leverage your experience and strong technical skills in BI development in support of OHA’s Data & Analytics strategic priorities. You will thrive as a creative problem solver who embraces the opportunity to address these challenges through the development of local databases, reports, dashboards, and analytics toolsets. Proactive long-term thinking and the ability to build relationships and lead change will be critical as you help strengthen the foundations of OHA’s Data and Analytics offering.\xa0Through a strong working knowledge of database design, data management and the creation of customer-oriented analytics platforms, you will help OHA establish impactful toolsets that sit on a relational Data Warehouse.\xa0\xa0', 'Estimated breakdown of responsibilities will include:', 'usiness Intelligence (70%):', ' Oversee BI application delivery encompassing knowledge of formal methodologies and disciplines for delivering new or enhanced Data Visualizations, OLAP, and Data Warehouse. Create and document reusable business intelligence (BI) objects/templates and develop the business semantic layer for end-users. Configure, customize and troubleshoot BI tool problems, and tune for performance. Monitor operating efficiency of existing BI systems. To facilitate business decisions, professional consulting approaches will be applied in providing technical or business guidance to clients and partners. Gather business requirements, understand key business problems, and develop strategies to translate raw data into business insights with data visualization tools for key stakeholders.', 'Database Development (30%): ', 'Working with subject matter experts (both external and internal to the OHA), design and develop database(s) geared toward solving defined business problems. The design thinking should include best practices of how each database interacts together within the data warehouse.\xa0', '\xa0', 'The Candidate:', 'The ideal candidate possesses a Masters in Health Informatics, Computer Sciences, Management Analytics, Statistics, or equivalents, with experience in data management and IT solution implementation. Demonstrated proficiency in database design, development, reporting, and data visualization are essential.', 'Proven expertise in business intelligence development, reporting (using SQL queries, stored procedures, etc.), applications and tools (SQL Management Studio, SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS)) is required. ', 'Experience in data visualization and dashboard development with Tableau will be an asset, as will experience working with clinical, financial, or administrative datasets within acute care settings, LHINs, or other healthcare sectors will be an asset.', 'OHA’s toolsets will only be as successful as their ability to deliver meaningful value and insights to our member hospitals.\xa0Therefore, you must have excellent interpersonal, facilitation, written and verbal communication skills as well as strong research and analytical skills and proven project management expertise.\xa0Working in a team environment, the Business Intelligence Specialist will be a highly motivated self-starter who enjoys working in a fast-paced environment, is able to build successful relationships with a variety of stakeholders and enjoys turning detailed data into impactful insights.', 'The ideal candidate is dynamic, positive, collaborative, persuasive, resilient, driven and results-oriented and displays the values of ', 'Humility, Discovery and Passion', '.', '\xa0', 'To Apply:', 'Potential applicants are invited to submit a resume and covering letter by March 17, 2020. If contacted for an interview, please inform us should accommodation be required.']

['About Us', 'To ', '"Build with Confidence"', ', INDUS.AI works with owners, builders, and general contractors to deliver data and insights via computer vision and artificial intelligence. With our ambient project monitoring system, our customers can make more informed decisions, more easily manage their projects, and perhaps most importantly get home quicker and safer. We are in a rapid growth phase. If you like challenge, excitement, creative thinking, join our team and work with industry leaders.', 'Job Summary', "INDUS.AI is looking for an enthusiastic and motivated Computer Vision Engineer to join our team. You'll be working closely with our research and development team to craft cutting edge methods to tackle different problems on construction sites such as safety non-compliance and low productivity.", 'What are my responsibilities ?', 'Design and develop state-of-the-art Computer Vision and Machine Learning algorithms for scene analysis, semantic segmentation, object detection and classification, object tracking, and activity recognition.', 'Working closely with the engineering team to integrate perception solutions.', 'Act as a mentor and subject matter expert within the computer vision group and with other key stakeholders.', 'Research, design, and implement algorithms in Deep Learning for Computer Vision and Perception. ', 'Apply image and video analysis techniques to large-scale, real-world problems. ', 'Fast prototyping, feasibility studies, specification and implementation of visual perception product components. ', 'Developing a comprehensive testing protocol for all projects.', 'Solving complex real-world challenges in creative, effective and efficient ways.', 'Planning and managing time, tasks, milestones and resources to meet project objectives.', 'Communicating and coordinating with relevant engineering, operation and product teams during all phases of technology development and technology deployment.', 'Solving unique problems and working on a small, self-directed team. ', "Directly influence the vision and objectives for your team's work in alignment with business and market needs. ", 'Directly change what we do in INDUS.AI fulfillment service to delight our customers. ', 'What do I need to qualify for this job?', '4+ years of work experience in Computer Vision', 'M.S. in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or related discipline required with a focus on Deep Learning, Computer Vision and Machine Learning.', 'Leverages the power of existing Neural Network inferencing frameworks like TensorRT and OpenVINO.', 'Implement or port machine learning and image processing algorithms to NVIDIA Jetson, Intel Movidius Myriad VPU, or Coral.', 'Hands-on coding skills and ability to quickly prototype in Python and C/C++ is a must.', 'Experience with parallel computing, OpenCL, CUDA, GPGPU, FPGA', 'Experience in', 'Video Streaming Delivery Protocols (RTMP, HTTP, HTTPS, TCP, UDP).', 'Video Formats and Codecs (HLS, HDS, MP4, H264/5, etc.).', 'Video Encoders (FFMPEG, Digital Rapids, Vantage, Elemental).', 'Experience in tools and frameworks for deep learning (TensorFlow, PyTorch, MXNet) with strong hands on experience in at least one of them is required. ', 'Outstanding written and verbal communication skills in English are required. ', 'Ability to handle and solve complex issues in systematic and creative ways.', 'Ability to work well in a fast-paced team environment and self-motivated.', 'What makes me stand out from the crowd?', 'Proven record of innovation and delivery of results to solve real-world problems.', 'Knowledge of Edge Computing.', 'Familiarity with ROS', 'Deep understanding and hands-on knowledge of Deep Learning and its applications in Computer Vision. ', 'Ability to work on challenging assignments with aggressive schedules.', 'Job Benefits', "At INDUS.AI, we're building a whole new category in an industry that desperately needs it. Managing modern day construction projects is like flying a 747 with no instrumentation. We're building the altimeter, compass, heading indicator, … you get the picture. This may be the most meaningful work you'll ever do. In order to deliver on such a promise, we've created a stellar environment for you and your career growth.", ' ', 'Our 5 core values', 'Delight Customers', 'Teamwork Makes the Dream Work', 'Face the Feedback', 'Embrace Learning From Failure', 'Get It Done', ' ', 'Benefits include a competitive salary with stock options, standard health benefits, as well as some other more interesting benefits like wellness and professional development allowances, and employee discounts.', '2LnYbhu42V']

['Company Overview', 'WE is a movement that brings people together and gives them the tools to change the world. Our vision is to shift the world from “me” to “we.” Our mission is to empower all people to change the world, locally and globally, achieving transformative outcomes for themselves and others.', 'WE –Making doing good, doable.', 'Job Summary', 'WE is seeking a curious, detail-oriented Research Coordinator on the Monitoring and Evaluation Team at WE. The role will report directly to the Director, Research Strategy, Insights and Reporting and work daily with the Team’s Senior Managers. This individual must be passionate and committed to the core beliefs of the organization—the WE.org Philosophy.', 'This full-time position is based out of WE’s office in Toronto, Ontario', 'Responsibilities And Duties', 'Impact measurement - including but not limited to questionnaire design, survey execution, data entry, data cleaning/analysis and reporting. ', ' Analysis of primary research and industry trends from secondary data.', 'Assists in the production of dashboards and scorecards.', 'Support groups within the Partner Relations team and across the organization.', 'Support in the development of new processes to enhance measurement and evaluation.', 'Support in the creation of reporting reflecting the efforts of WE’s Programs', 'Qualifications And Skills', 'Detail oriented, thorough, precise and aware of deliverable dates and timelines, able to manage multiple responsibilities within competing deadlines.', 'Curious, love of analysis and understanding the why.', 'Collaborative team player with a strong work ethic, experience with cross functional teams and supplier management an asset.', 'Able to see the "big picture", problem-solve, and, provide insightful feedback.', '1-2 years of market research experience with experience using research and data analytics software, experience with MS Office and Salesforce.', 'A Bachelor’s degree: Sociology, Psychology, Economics, Political Science, Human Factors, or related disciplines.', 'Strong customer service orientation.', 'Strong organizational skills, strong business writing and communication skills. ', 'Able to receive an assignment and follow-through with a high-quality output.', 'Willingness to carry out a range of administrative tasks.', 'What Makes Us Unique…', 'WE is a family of organizations making doing good, doable.\u202f WE Charity empowers domestic and international change. ME to WE is a social enterprise that creates socially conscious products and experiences to help support the charity. And WE Day fills stadiums around the world with the greatest celebration of social good. WE enables youth and families to better the world – supporting 2,500+ local and global causes by volunteering millions of hours of service, shopping daily with an impact, and raising millions of dollars that directly benefit their local communities and the world. Globally, our teams in Asia, Africa, and Latin America have provided more than 1 million people with clean water, built 1,000 schools and schoolrooms overseas, and empowered more than 200,000 children with access to education. WE was founded more than 20 years ago by social entrepreneurs, brothers Craig and Marc Kielburger. Join the movement today at WE.org \u202f We are an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and welcomes all interested parties to apply. Accommodations are available on request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process. We sincerely thank all those who apply, however only those considered for an interview will be contacted', 'Learn more about ME to WE: https://www.metowe.com/about-us/our-story/', 'Learn more about WE Charity’s fight against child labor: https://www.cnn.com/2019/03/13/opinions/craig-kielburger-young-people-endchild-labor/index.html', 'Meet our Founders: https://www.craigkielburger.com or https://www.marckielburger.com', 'Follow Us On', 'Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/wemovement/ Twitter – https://twitter.com/wemovement Facebook – https://www.facebook.com/WEmovement/ YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/WEMOVEMENT', 'Learn Proven Job Search Skills', 'WE is committed to supporting your path to personal and career development, no matter where your journey leads. Join ', 'Prepped', ', a free digital training platform powered by RBC Ventures, and learn proven job search skills – from interviewing essentials to networking like a pro – to help you succeed in your job search.', 'Sign-up free today!', 'WE values diversity in its workforce and encourages applications from all qualified individuals. Applicants requiring a disability-related accommodation at any stage of WE’s recruitment process should contact the People Operations and Culture Department by email at hr@we.org. As required by applicable legislation, WE will consult with applicants requesting such an accommodation to ensure that WE’s recruitment process takes into account their accessibility needs, including in relation to the materials or processes to be used by WE.']

["We are a group of passionate individuals working towards making TouchBistro the #1 global POS product. We are all about ownership, giving each member the tools, support, and freedom to succeed. Above all else, we value personal and professional growth, true teamwork and collaboration, and celebrating each other's wins while still driving to achieve even more. We are fun, scrappy, and aren’t afraid to take risks. If this sounds like a team you’d like to be a part of, get in touch", "Reporting to the Manager, Data Services, as a Senior Data Analyst, you will be a member of the Data Services team who are responsible for building, operating, and maintaining the data pipelines, infrastructure, and tooling to fuel the organization's data needs. Your role is to be the conduit for departments to learn, interpret, and explore our data. Whether that data is generated from our restaurant platforms, originates from our internal systems, or is shared to us by our partners your contributions will enable us to harness the full potential of data across TouchBistro.", '\xa0', 'YOUR DAY-to-DAY', 'Collaborate with departments across the organization to aid in the development of their standard reports, shared dashboards, and ad-hoc queries', 'Analyze current and potential future data sources for the business to align with the reporting and analytical data needs of the organization', 'Build and rollout tools and solutions that provide the organization with self-serve access to solve and streamline their day-to-day data analytical needs', 'Document and maintain accessible data dictionaries, business definitions, and data specifications that enable the organization to fully interpret the data sources available', 'Research and define processes and solutions to perform integrity manipulations to our data including data cleansing, deduplication, and application of business rules\xa0', 'Contribute to the development of reporting solutions for various TouchBistro products and services', '\xa0', 'ALL ABOUT YOU', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Mathematics, Statistics, or a related field required', '5+ years data analytics experience', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to effectively communicate technical concepts and ideas to all levels of employees and management', 'Experience with SQL-based database management systems such as Microsoft SQL Server, Postgres, or Oracle', 'Knowledge of agile delivery methodologies\xa0', '\xa0', 'NICE TO HAVE', 'Experience working in a SaaS-based software company a plus', 'Experience working in either the restaurant and/or payments industry a plus', 'Experience working with BI and data visualization tools such as Tableau, PowerBI, and Looker a plus', 'Knowledge in working various ETL development tools such as SSIS, Informatica, AWS Glue and AWS Data Pipeline a plus', '\xa0', 'WHY CHOOSE US?', 'TouchBistro is an award-winning iPad Point of Sale system, built for restaurant people by restaurant people. We’re a team of thinkers, builders, doers, and innovators. While many of us have experience working at restaurants, some of us just have a true passion for the industry.', 'We’re venture backed by some of the best tech VCs in the world and are partnered with top innovators in the mobile, food, and payment industries.', 'We’re global and growing! TouchBistro is used in more than 100 countries worldwide and has offices in NYC, Austin, Chicago, London and headquarters in Toronto. We’re a fast-moving, ever-evolving company on a mission to change the way restaurateurs do business and help them succeed through our products and services, but we need talented, passionate people to help!', 'So, what do you say? Are you ready to become part of something awesome?', '\xa0', '\xa0', '\xa0', 'TouchBistro believes in fostering an inclusive workplace where all individuals have an opportunity to succeed. Requests for accommodation due to a disability can be made at any stage of the recruitment process.']

['About Toptal', 'Toptal is a global network of top talent in business, design, and technology that enables companies to scale their teams, on-demand. With $200+ million in annual revenue and over 40% year-over-year growth, Toptal is the largest fully distributed workforce in the world.', 'We take the best elements of virtual teams and combine them with a support structure that encourages innovation, social interaction, and fun (see this video from The Huffington Post). We see no borders, move at a fast pace, and are never afraid to break the mold.', 'Position Description', 'Are you interested in playing a critical role as a strategic advisor to both our business functions and our leaders? This senior-level analyst will provide business leaders with crucial insights and recommendations for improvement. This team member will use data, create and define metrics, measure performance, and develop reports. They will also build models, forecast outcomes, run experiments, and perform in-depth diagnostic analysis.', 'We require both strong technical data skills and business insight for this role. Ultimate success goes beyond data-related activities and delivers the “so what” that drives decisions and real business impact. It is imperative to fully understand the business function (processes, objectives, organization, performance drivers, barriers), and connect the dots between data analysis, business strategy, and operational effectiveness.', 'We are looking for a critical thinker, problem-solver, and self-starter. We are very driven and proactive, think independently, and do not just take orders. There must be an ability to see the bigger picture to make cross-functional connections in both business processes and data. We expect that we not only answer the question asked, but also the question that was not. The Business Analyst needs to build positive relationships across the organization and have a “find a way” attitude.', 'This role is part of our new “Business Analytics Center of Excellence,” where analysts will be assigned to support one or more business functions. These functions include SMB sales, Enterprise sales, digital marketing, brand marketing, talent operations, finance, or business operations.', 'This is a remote position that can be done from anywhere. Due to the remote nature of this role, we are unable to provide visa sponsorship. Resumes and communication must be submitted in English.', 'Responsibilities', ' ', 'Analyze data, build models, test hypotheses, find root causes, develop prototypes, forecast performance, create Tableau reports, and write SQL scripts; and extract insights from these data activities to inform business decisions', ' ', 'Use descriptive (what happened) and diagnostic (why did it happen) analytics to develop specific, actionable recommendations for business leaders', ' ', 'Define metrics that are independent, holistic, accurate, encourage the right behaviors, and are aligned with company strategy and objectives', ' ', 'Map business processes to their corresponding data flow', ' ', 'Proactively identify and surface opportunities to improve efficiency, conversion, revenue generation, client and talent experience, operations, communication, systems & tools, cash usage, etc.', ' ', 'Work closely with data analysts, data scientists, report developers, and business process owners to empower data-backed decision making', ' ', 'In The First Week, Expect To', ' ', 'Onboard and integrate into Toptal, and quickly begin learning about Toptal’s history, culture, and vision', ' ', 'Shadow key teams to learn the core of Toptal’s operations and capabilities, including Growth, Talent Operations, Enterprise, and SMB', ' ', 'In The First Month, Expect To', ' ', 'Understand the data generated through company operations and activities and where/how that data is stored–especially as it relates to our team', ' ', 'Obtain a basic understanding of the assigned business function and its operations', ' ', 'Assess the current state of performance metrics, reports, dashboards, models, and analyses used, and identify discrepancies and areas for improvement', ' ', 'Begin supporting the function leader with relevant insights and reports for bi-weekly leadership meetings', ' ', 'In The First Three Months, Expect To', ' ', 'Develop a proficiency of data elements of the function and obtain a robust understanding of critical business processes', ' ', 'Begin standardizing definitions and aligning metrics with OKRs and company initiatives', ' ', 'Begin identifying new opportunities to explore in the quest to improve performance continually', ' ', 'In The First Six Months, Expect To', ' ', 'Begin to solve real business problems as a team that will move the needle on key performance metrics', ' ', 'Help us align and standardize metric definitions across the company', ' ', 'Perform detailed root cause analysis to expose critical drivers of performance', ' ', 'In The First Year, Expect To', ' ', 'Inform significant strategic initiatives, goals, priorities, and performance indicators', ' ', 'Become an expert both on business process and data flow and assist in building a new outstanding business analytics function', ' ', 'Requirements', ' ', '5+ years of experience in data science, data analysis, analytics, business intelligence, or reporting is required.', ' ', 'Experience with BI tools (Tableau, Qlik, PowerBI, etc.)', ' ', 'Proficiency in SQL; experience with R, Python, or MATLAB is a plus', ' ', 'Exploratory data analysis, prototyping, testing hypotheses, performing root cause analyses, modeling business processes, building forecasts, creating predictive models, defining metrics, and/or measuring business performance', ' ', 'Track record of linking data and analytics to business strategy and operations to drive real impact', ' ', 'Working knowledge of probability and statistics, experience with process improvement is a plus', ' ', 'Ability to explain complex issues simply and intuitively, and willingness to challenge assumptions, communicate limitations and flag blind spots', ' ', 'Both a strong background in math, science, engineering, or statistics and deep business insight is required; advanced degrees and/or MBA are a plus', ' ', 'A world-class individual contributor typically thrives at Toptal', ' ', 'For Toptal Use Only: #individualcontributorSA #boeurope #bosouthamerica #canada #bocanada']

['TradeRev has changed the automotive industry with its revolutionary product. Built as a multi-platform live auction app, TradeRev’s online automotive remarketing system has made a huge impact in the industry and has acquired quick user adoption with a fast-growing client base. As a subsidiary of KAR Global, Inc. and partnering with our sister company ADESA, we are continuing to expand TradeRev’s footprint in the dealer-to-dealer online space in the US and Canadian markets.', 'Why Work with Us?', "Whether your Fun is in working with new technology, learning skills, collaborating with awesomely talented people or growing into a Specialist, Team Lead or People Manager, we want to feed this fire in you. If you have the work ethic, skill and motivation, we will help you find a path that leads you where your passion wants to go. So come on; let's have Fun together.", 'Our Core Values:', ' We are FHAB. Fun. Honest. Accountable. Brave.', 'Take a look at our other benefits here: http://work.traderev.com/', 'Position Overview', 'We are seeking a Business Analyst who will understand TradeRev’s business goals and clearly translate them into product requirements. You will be working closely with developers, product managers, project managers, designers and stakeholders (internal and external). Not only will you bridge the gap between business and technology, but you will be heavily contributing to design solutions that will enhance the customer experience.', 'Responsibilities And Duties', 'Work alongside internal and external stakeholders to gather, define and review requirements, solution designs and user specifications', 'Clearly document business requirements as an active participant in both discovery and product development process', 'Partner with Product, Design, Engineering, and Data Science teams to create solutions to operation problems, influence product roadmaps, and solution new products and processes', 'Take ownership of the internal product documentation systems and processes', 'Perform ad hoc data analysis to remove roadblocks and keep operations running smoothly ', 'Identify opportunities by researching and analyzing customer segments and global market conditions ', 'Qualifications & Education Requirements', 'A Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Business/Marketing, Finance, Computer Science, or other technical or quantitative field strongly preferred', '2+ years experience as a Business Analyst (at a software company, preferred)', 'A team player with a natural curiosity to look for and uncover business insights from data', 'Solid understanding of RDBMS. Practical knowledge of writing complex SQL queries, stored procedures, table views, and etc', 'A story teller. Strong verbal and written communication skills with the ability to present complex information clearly and concisely to varying audiences both internally and externally', 'Working knowledge of analytics and visualization tools, like Tableau, is a big bonus', 'Detail oriented and able to look at a wide array of choices to identify what will create the most impact for our users', 'Problem solving skills are a must. Identify opportunities to innovate and execute against them ', 'We thank all applicants for their interest. Only candidates selected for an interview will be considered.', 'TradeRev is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity. TradeRev is committed to providing employment in accordance with the Ontario Human Rights Code and the Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act. Any assessment and selection materials or processes used during the recruitment process will be available in an accessible format to applicants with disabilities, upon request. If contacted for an interview, please advise Human Resources if you require disability-related accommodation.']

['Performance Analyst', 'The opportunity', 'The Performance Analyst reports to the Manager/Senior Manager, Performance Analytics and is responsible for performance measurement, attribution and analytical reporting, handling of complex issues and participation in projects. The Analyst ensures accuracy through analytical reviews and reasonability checks, while following established procedures, internal controls and Board policies.', "Who You'll Work With", 'You will collaborate with team members and managers and work closely with different functional partners to resolve data and system issues.', "What You'll Do", 'Analytics ', 'Take on a lead role within the performance team to deliver daily/monthly performance and analytical reporting and various projects.', 'Build analytical reports for various partners including Investments, Total Fund Management, People & Culture and the Board.', 'Develop business analytics solutions to visualize performance data and results in reporting dashboards and apps.', 'Respond to ad hoc requests and provide solutions for stakeholders.', 'Business Partnership ', 'Translate analytical data into a coherent story to deliver practical insights', 'Strong consulting skills and judgement in assessing partner requests, discovering the real issue of client’s requests and offering complete responses of options and solutions', 'Able to influence, build relationships and communicate effectively. Must be able to challenge recommendations and beliefs thoughtfully to make valuable contributions to sound decision making', 'Has good understanding of the business and can anticipate needs and think strategically to move the business forward', 'Responsible for production of key investment performance and management reporting', 'Reviews / audits work of fellow performance analysts and assists with training of new performance analysts', 'Provide recommendations and knowledge transfer on data analytics and report design best practices', 'You are encouraged to independently identify data issues and to work with various functional partners on resolution; issues should be raised to management where necessary', 'Deliver insightful and relevant performance analysis and reporting. You will assess clients’ issues and come up with thoughtful analysis using available data resources.', "What You'll Need", 'Relevant university degree in business administration, finance or applied mathematics.', 'CFA designation or working towards completion an asset.', 'Experience with data analytics and data visualization (Power BI).', '3+ years of relevant experience in performance measurement or data analytics.', 'Experience in financial services / investment management industry.', 'Knowledge of investment accounting and risk measurement.', 'You have advanced skills in MS Office applications (Excel, Word, Access, PowerPoint).', 'Excellent interpersonal skills both oral and written.', 'Strong problem-solving skills, ability to think creatively and appetite for quantitative analysis.', 'Strong teammate with the ability to work independently and with minimal guidance.', 'High attention to detail and accuracy.', 'What We’re Offering', 'Pay for performance environment that offers competitive salary and incentives', 'Numerous opportunities for professional growth and development', 'Comprehensive employer paid benefits coverage, including a Health Spending Account', 'Retirement income through a defined benefit pension plan', 'Competitive time off', 'Discount programs including Edvantage and Perkopolis', 'Degreed: a digital platform that helps you quickly and easily discover, share, and track ALL kinds of learning resources — from courses to videos to articles and more ', "At Ontario Teachers', we are a globally minded organization and take pride ensuring that the people we hire and the culture we create reflects and celebrates diversity of thought, background and experience.", 'If you require an accommodation for the application, recruitment or interview process, please let us know and we will work with you to meet your needs.', 'How To Apply', 'Are you ready to pursue new challenges and take your career to the next level? Apply today!', 'We thank you for applying, however, only those selected to continue will be contacted. Note that candidates must be legally entitled to work in the country where this role is located.', 'Functional Area', 'Finance', 'Requisition ID', '2704', 'The privacy of your personal information is important to us. Please visit our Privacy Centre to learn how we handle your personal information.']
