['Flipp is a retail technology company that is reinventing the way people shop. We work with the largest retailers and manufacturers in the world to help them transform their business and connect them with tens of millions of shoppers through the next generation digital shopping marketplace.', 'We are looking for a Data Engineer to work on our Business Intelligence Team. The role entails working with advanced technologies like Apache Spark, Apache Kafka and AWS ecosystem and provide data solutions for Retail and Ecommerce problems. You will be working on building an enterprise data warehouse that finds an optimal balance between the 4Vs (Volume, Variety, Velocity and Veracity) of the Big Data enabling analysts & business to make informed decisions"', 'Most Of The Things You Will Work On', ' ', 'Implement real-time and batch processing data processing data frameworks', ' ', 'Develop and manage scalable data processing platforms used by Data Science, Engineering and Analytics organizations', ' ', 'Consult with Data Science and Analytics management to provide best practices for data modelling', ' ', 'Implement data pipelines through collection, storage, transformation and normalization of large data sets.', ' ', 'Planning and estimating features the roadmap to determine the next sprint goals', ' ', 'Design and implement automated unit and integration test strategies', ' ', "You'll Need To Have", ' ', 'Bachelor’s degree Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent', ' ', '2+ years of working in a Data engineering department with experience writing ETL’s on big data platforms such as Hadoop, HDFS, Kafka', ' ', '2+ years of designing and managing big data platforms such as Hadoop, Kafka or cloud based managed solutions.', ' ', '2+ years of experience working with data processing languages such as pySpark, Hive, Scala Spark', ' ', 'Track record of shipping quality code and delivering high quality features', ' ', 'Here’s How We Work', 'From working with top technologies to sending you to industry-leading conferences, we will make sure you have all that you need to expand your knowledge and grow your career. We have a trust-based culture where all team members are empowered to work in the way that’s best for them to thrive.', 'Our culture is at the centre of all that we do, and it has been recognized through numerous accolades over the past three years including: Best Workplaces in Canada, Deloitte 50 Best Managed, Best Workplaces in Canada for Women, Most Admired CEO and Top 10 Most Admired Corporate Cultures.', "Here's How To Apply", 'If you’re interested in working with us on the future of shopping, click the “Apply now” button to submit your application. While experience and skillsets are valuable, growth potential and attitudes are equally important. If you’re prepared to grow drastically with your team at a world-class learning organization, consider applying. We understand that the most creative solutions require diversity in thought and life experiences.', 'Flipp is an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. Accommodations are available on request for all aspects of the selection process.']

['Key Accountabilities', 'Reporting to the Associate Director, Safety & Security Quality Assurance, this position is responsible for the detailed analysis of safety and security data and working with the different business units on the development of processes and procedures for the consistent measurement of safety and security trends and performance across the organization.', ' ', 'Extract and analyze safety and security information from multiple data sources to drive safety and security performance at the GTAA and Toronto Pearson.', ' ', 'Collate data and conduct in-depth trending and analysis.', ' ', 'Import and export safety data to support all business units.', ' ', 'Generate reports for all key safety metrics to provide visibility to key areas of opportunities.', ' ', 'Tracking and trending of leading and lagging indicators.', ' ', 'Collect and analyze data from all management systems, compile safety statistics and generate reports based on collected data.', ' ', 'Develop refined analytical models and reports that convey key issues to management.', ' ', 'Work with business units to create safety and security data collection guidelines for internal use.', ' ', 'Assist management systems with the development of leading and lagging indicators.', ' ', 'Maintain in-depth knowledge of business units’ objectives, goals and KPI’s as they relate to safety and security.', ' ', 'Primary contact for analytics data for each management system.', ' ', 'Use statistical methods to identify areas for operational improvement.', ' ', 'Identify and escalate data issues to support continuous process improvement.', ' ', 'Maintain current knowledge of applicable legislation for each of the management system standards.', ' ', 'Work with departments to prioritize changes to business units. ', ' ', 'Ensure internal compliance with GTAA Corporate Administrative policies regarding record management and retention, filing, off-site storage – includes transfer and disposal of files and records in accordance with established retention schedules and policies.', ' ', 'Qualifications', ' ', 'Must possess a University degree or college diploma in a related field ', ' ', 'Minimum 2 years’ experience in a data management/analyst role', ' ', 'Experience in MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, Access, PowerPoint)', ' ', 'Experience in the principles of analytics and statistics', ' ', 'Must be able to obtain and retain Transportation Security Clearance ', ' ', 'Knowledge, Skills and Abilities', ' ', 'In depth knowledge of statistics and predictive models', ' ', 'Strong analytical skills', ' ', 'KPI reporting and data visualization techniques', ' ', 'Understanding how to use Microsoft office products', ' ', 'Advanced user of Excel', ' ', 'Ability to effectively work independently and in teams', ' ', 'Ability to transform detailed analysis into straightforward summaries', ' ', 'General knowledge of management system principles.', ' ', 'Ability to pull data from multiple sources and formulate comprehensive and actionable reports', ' ', 'Methodical, organized and high attention to detail', ' ', 'Strong quantitative skills, attention to detail, a high aptitude for problem solving ', ' ', 'Knowledge of and demonstrated ability in corporate core competencies including customer service, communication, team work, initiative/self-management and accountability, and flexibility/adaptability.', ' ', 'Demonstrated ability to work independently in managing priorities and meeting deadlines.']

['Role Description:', 'The Data Governance Office at QuadReal is a global function dedicated to producing, promoting, and supporting the availability of the quality information required to create data as a competitive advantage.\xa0', 'Reporting to the Data Governance Manager, the ', 'Data Governance Analyst', ' also takes direction from the Enterprise Content Manager and Vice President of Data Management. This role collaboratively supports the roll out and maintenance of the operational framework to facilitate data governance and enterprise content management.\xa0This role supports the Data Governance (DG) program by facilitating the execution and integration of Data Governance, Data Quality and Data Management processes across the enterprise, within IT and business functions.\xa0', 'Key responsibilities of this role include acting as the communication hub for Data Management; administrator and content manager for the implementation of a new enterprise data governance tool, Collibra; process and tool training and support of business and IT staff; facilitating data quality improvement initiatives and remediation workgroups; managing the business glossary and assisting with taxonomy; managing the case management system; maintaining collaboration sites and preparing data governance adoption metrics and data quality status for stakeholders. The Data Management Office is in a building phase and is seeking talent committed to innovation and change.\xa0\xa0', 'Responsibilities:\xa0', 'Communication Hub', 'Track Relationship Management referring questions to others in the group or outside the group (to Stewards and SMEs) as appropriate.', 'Organize training for data education, business glossary, standards, etc.', 'Draft and execute as needed.', 'Business Glossary - capturing details for key enterprise data concepts', 'Maintain integrity of the business glossary.', 'Administer access to and functionality of the business working group results.', 'Review glossary and approve readiness to load, and check approval status and approval workflow status.', 'Accept project work required for glossary.', 'Assist in the build out of QuadReal taxonomy.\xa0\xa0', 'Case Management ', 'Administer the case management (Issues) list.', 'Based on issues identified by ECM manager, Data Governance Manager, Data Governance Council, Data Quality Issues or Steward Network, etc. create, manage and track case initiatives.', 'Work with case stakeholders to identify necessary participants.', 'Project manage cases by convening a working group, develops meeting materials, sets-up meetings and working groups on relevant data topics, develops meeting agendas, performs pre-meeting research and determines attendee lists.', 'Assist the working group meetings, ensuring movement towards decision by recording action items, owners and completion criteria and ensuring participation.', 'Take minutes at working groups and publishes department site to capitalize on Microsoft Teams.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Other duties as necessary to supports support the DG lead in achieving the data management enablement JOB TITLE: ['Opportunities for Database analysts and data administrators']
COMPANY NAME: A V Immigration and Careers Consultancy Pvt Ltd (Apex Visas)
JOB DECSRIPTION: ['Suggested Job Duties', 'Database analysts perform some or all of the following duties:', ' ', ' Collect and document user requirements', ' ', ' Design and develop database architecture for information systems projects', ' ', ' Design, construct, modify, integrate, implement and test data models and database management systems', ' ', ' Conduct research and provide advice to other informatics professionals regarding the selection, application and implementation of database management tools', ' ', ' Operate database management systems to analyze data and perform data mining analysis.', ' ', ' May lead, co-ordinate or supervise other workers in this group.', ' ', 'Data administrators perform some or all of the following duties:', ' ', ' Develop and implement data administration policy, standards and models', ' ', ' Research and document data requirements, data collection and administration policy, data access rules and security', ' ', ' Develop policies and procedures for network and/or Internet database access and usage and for the backup and recovery of data', ' ', ' Conduct research and provide advice to other information systems professionals regarding the collection, availability, security and suitability of data', ' ', ' Write scripts related to stored procedures and triggers', ' ', ' May lead and co-ordinate teams of data administrators in the development and implementation of data policies, standards and models.', ' ', 'This job is provided by Shine.com']

['Customer Facing Data Scientists (CFDSs) are critical to making our customers successful. An ideal CFDS candidate should have strong fundamentals of applied data science in business setting, and should enjoy communicating and evangelizing data science solutions to business stakeholders.', 'Roles And Responsibilities', ' ', ' Product ', ' ', ' Representing the DataRobot product from a technical standpoint to customers - including demonstrations, conducting proof-of-concept trials, helping clients evaluate success criteria, and training users ', ' ', ' Providing the customer’s point of view to DataRobot’s Product team, informing the direction of future product feature development ', ' ', ' ', ' Data Science ', ' ', ' Enabling customers to solve complex data science problems using DataRobot - including problem framing, data preparation, model building, model deployment, model management, and output consumption ', ' ', ' In some cases, executing data science workflows for customers ', ' ', ' Providing data science knowledge and expertise as a trusted advisor to the client ', ' ', ' ', ' Project management ', ' ', ' Conducting and managing data science projects with customer’s vision of success in mind ', ' ', ' Collaborating with Sales, Field Engineers, and the rest of the DataRobot team to identify the best possible resources to move forward customer’s projects ', ' ', ' ', ' Leadership ', ' ', ' Building a long-term trusted relationship with the customer so that the customers can be led towards success ', ' ', ' Understanding and empathizing with customers’ pain points of building AI solutions ', ' ', ' Qualifying opportunities where DataRobot can be a suitable fit and thus making DataRobot more efficient ', ' ', ' Presenting DataRobot in industry conferences as well as creating powerful technical content for marketing purposes ', ' ', ' ', 'On a day-to-day basis, CFDS work side-by-side with the Sales, Account Management, and Field Engineering teams to help our customers achieve their goals with DataRobot. Internally, CFDS act as the voice of customer to the Product, Engineering, and Marketing teams.', 'Main Requirements', ' ', ' 4-5+ years of real-world business experience in a data science role ', ' ', ' Hands-on experience building and implementing predictive models using machine learning algorithms ', ' ', ' Strong customer interaction experience ', ' ', ' Strong project management skills ', ' ', ' Excellent organizational, communication, writing and interpersonal skills ', ' ', ' Familiarity with a variety of technical tools for the manipulation of datasets ', ' ', ' Fluency with scripting (Python / R) ', ' ', ' Going onsite to customer locations in and around Toronto. Up to 20% Travel outside Toronto area, including to US. ', ' ', 'Desired Skills', ' ', ' Familiarity with consultative sales process in the analytics marketplace ', ' ', ' Familiarity with Hadoop and related Big Data technologies ', ' ', ' Experience dealing with complex customer organizations ', ' ', ' Deep experience with specific industries (e.g. banking, healthcare, insurance) or specific problem types (e.g. time-series, optimization)']
